snippets.title: Batch ID Tagging
snippets.description: Implement batch tags (date, shift, mix) + pallet IDs to trace defects.

snippets.title: Yard Breakage Check
snippets.description: Run a daily breakage audit; fix the top cause (handling, stacking) in 72 hours.

snippets.title: Sand Moisture Routine
snippets.description: Daily sand moisture check + correction table to stabilize water/cement ratio.

snippets.title: Golden Machine Setup
snippets.description: Post specific machine settings (vibration/pressure) and reset every shift.

snippets.title: Pre-Load Photo Proof
snippets.description: Take pre-load photos to reduce disputes and stop shipping damage.

snippets.title: Standard Lead Times
snippets.description: Publish standard lead times per SKU family and stop "urgent exceptions".

snippets.title: Cost-to-Serve Sheet
snippets.description: Calculate price minus freight/breakage for top 20 customers.

snippets.title: Margin Floor Lockdown
snippets.description: Freeze discounts on orders below a minimum gross margin percentage.

snippets.title: Simple Downtime Log
snippets.description: Log downtime with 6 codes; fix the #1 cause this week.

snippets.title: Start-Shift Mold Check
snippets.description: Inspect molds at shift start; remove worn tools before bad runs.

snippets.title: Choke Point Count
snippets.description: Cycle count cement, sand, and pallets; correct records immediately.

snippets.title: Dead Stock Release
snippets.description: Identify oldest stock blocks/pavers and sell/move them first.

snippets.title: Daily SQDC Huddle
snippets.description: 10-minute standing meeting: Safety, Quality, Delivery, Cost. Close 1 action.

snippets.title: Dust Control Sweep
snippets.description: Check cutting/grinding zones for silica dust controls; fix exposures.

snippets.action: Rank yards (A/B/C) and relocate or reduce density
Hive marking + visit routine + hidden placement
Split with purpose or add space

snippets.text: Buyer Spec Sheet Lock (1-pager): product, grade, size, defects, residues, packaging, labeling, temp, shelf-life, inspection method, claim window.
Incoterms + Risk Map per route: risk transfer point, who books carrier, who insures, who clears customs.
Claims Prevention Clause Set: photo evidence rules, sampling method, timelines, independent survey option.
Price Formula Guardrail: base price + quality premium/penalty + FX reference rate + revision triggers.
Approved Supplier List (ASL) with scoring: reliability, compliance, defect rate, traceability, on-time fill.
Harvest-to-Dispatch Calendar: weekly volume forecast, buffer %, alternate suppliers.
Side-Selling Prevention: partial prepayments tied to delivery + transparent grade rules + fast payouts for compliance.
Inbound Inspection Gate: accept / downgrade / reject rules; quarantine area for "hold & test".
Lot Coding Standard: supplier-date-field-batch code; printed on cartons; logged digitally.
Temperature & Hygiene Log: packing room temp, pre-cool temp, truck temp, container set-point, seal number.
Corrective Action Loop: top 3 defects weekly → root cause → supplier coaching → re-test.
Packaging Cost-per-Kg Dashboard (carton, liner, label, tape) with target thresholds.
Label Compliance Checklist: origin, variety, pack date, lot code, handling marks, importer info (market-specific).
Packhouse Flow Layout: dirty→clean zoning, minimize bruising, reduce re-handling.
3PL Scorecard: on-time pickup, temp compliance, damage claims, documentation reliability.
Pre-cool SOP: time-to-pre-cool target; pallets staged; airflow gaps; "no hot loading."
Container Load Plan: pallet pattern, ventilation spacing, humidity control notes, dunnage.
Document Pack Template: invoice, packing list, transport doc, origin docs, permits/certs, insurance cert.
Phytosanitary Workflow: inspection booking → treatment if needed → certificate issuance → attach to doc pack.
Discrepancy Proofing (LC-ready): names, dates, weights, HS codes, ports, Incoterms, signatures match exactly.
Margin Waterfall per shipment: farmgate → pack → inland logistics → docs → freight → finance cost → FX → net.
Payment Term Ladder: new buyer = partial prepay / CAD; trusted = net terms; high volume = LC/guarantees.
FX Rule: set pricing currency; define hedge/hold policy; use "rate buffer" for quotes.

snippets.title: CTQ Spec Lock
snippets.description: Lock top 10 SKUs’ CTQs (gauge/weight/seal) and enforce "ship only within spec."

snippets.title: 15-Min Traceability Drill
snippets.description: Implement a 15-minute traceability drill: prove you can identify affected lots fast.

snippets.title: Golden Settings Sheet
snippets.description: Create "golden settings" for top 10 SKUs and enforce shift handover.

snippets.title: Startup Scrap Attack
snippets.description: Measure startup scrap daily and attack the top 2 causes.

snippets.title: RFQ Follow-up Rhythm
snippets.description: Implement a follow-up cadence for RFQs and sampling.

snippets.title: Capacity-Based Promises
snippets.description: Tie promised lead times to capacity reality (stop expedite addiction).

snippets.title: Margin Floor & Discount Freeze
snippets.description: Identify bottom 20% margin SKUs and freeze discounts immediately.

snippets.title: Resin Index Clause
snippets.description: Add resin change clauses for new quotes (or shorten validity).

snippets.title: Daily OEE Tracking
snippets.description: Start daily OEE tracking with reason codes on top 2 lines.

snippets.title: WIP Flush
snippets.description: Cap WIP and clear the oldest work first to release cash.

snippets.title: Standard Changeover
snippets.description: Implement a standard changeover checklist and measure time.

snippets.title: Stockout Killer (Min/Max)
snippets.description: Cycle count top 30 items and set reorder points to kill stockouts.

snippets.title: WIP-to-Cash List
snippets.description: Build WIP aging list and prioritize "oldest-to-cash first."

snippets.title: Pellet Loss Sweep
snippets.description: Start a simple pellet loss prevention routine (sweep, containment).

snippets.title: Bottleneck Backup Training
snippets.description: Build a skill matrix for bottleneck roles and train one backup.

snippets.title: Action-Closing Huddles
snippets.description: Launch daily huddles that close 1–2 actions/day (no backlog growth).

snippets.title: Fingerling/Seed Quality Gate
snippets.description: Stop "bad fish" at the gate.
snippets.objective: Prevent stocking weak or diseased stock that kills profit for 6 months.
steps: Supplier scoring + quarantine/observation protocol
Random sampling: size uniformity, deformities, vigor, mortality in first 48–72 hrs
Stocking log: date, batch, source, counts, expected survival
"Reject rules" for weak batches + replacement terms
snippets.outcome: Only viable stock enters the system.

snippets.title: FCR Control System
snippets.description: Stop feeding profit to the water.
snippets.objective: Lower feed cost per kg by matching ration to biomass and appetite.
steps: Feeding schedule by biomass estimate + water temp
Weekly sample weighing + biomass calculation
Feed log: kg issued, kg fed, feeding times, leftover check
Trigger rules: if FCR worsens → adjust ration, check water, check health
snippets.outcome: Lower FCR, reduced waste, better water quality.

snippets.title: Water Quality Lock
snippets.description: Prevent silent losses from bad water.
snippets.objective: Maintain optimal growth conditions and prevent stress-induced disease.
steps: Minimum test cadence (daily DO/temp; 2–3x/week pH; weekly ammonia/nitrite; more for RAS)
Aeration plan + backup power
"Red zone" thresholds + immediate response checklist
Pond/tank cleaning routines; sludge management; exchange/recirculation plan
snippets.outcome: Consistent growth, lower mortality risk.

snippets.title: Biosecurity Shield
snippets.description: Keep disease out.
snippets.objective: Prevent pathogen entry and spread between units.
steps: Visitor control + footbaths + tool separation
Stock movement rules (no mixing unknown batches)
Dead fish removal protocol + disposal log
Health observation checklist + escalation to vet/tech
snippets.outcome: Reduced disease outbreaks and treatment costs.

snippets.title: Mortality Spike Response
snippets.description: Stop the bleeding fast.
snippets.objective: Diagnose and contain outbreaks before they wipe out the crop.
steps: 30-minute drill: isolate, measure DO/temp/pH, inspect gills/behavior, check feed, check toxins
Sample capture for diagnosis
Stop feeding rule when critical parameters off
Post-mortem review: root cause + prevention
snippets.outcome: Minimised losses during health events.

snippets.title: Harvest Timing & Grading Engine
snippets.description: Maximize the value of every fish.
snippets.objective: Sell at the right size and uniformity for premium prices.
steps: Size-based harvest plan (avoid "too early/too late")
On-farm grading to protect premium price
Harvest loss controls: nets, crowding time limits, bruising reduction
Yield forecast by week for buyer commitments
snippets.outcome: Higher average price per kg and better buyer satisfaction.

snippets.title: Post-Harvest Cold Chain Discipline
snippets.description: Lock in freshness and weight.
snippets.objective: Prevent spoilage and rejections by maintaining temperature.
steps: Time-to-ice rule + ice ratio standard (e.g., 1:1 in hot climates)
Clean crates, clean water, clean surfaces (HACCP-style basics)
Temperature log at dispatch + receiving
Reject analysis: why buyers downgrade/reject
snippets.outcome: Reduced spoilage, fewer claims, better reputation.

snippets.title: Capture Fishery Landing-Site Handling
snippets.description: For capture fisheries: preserve catch value.
snippets.objective: Ensure catch from boats retains value through proper landing procedures.
steps: Simple landing SOP: shade, quick sort, wash policy, immediate icing
Lot tagging by boat/crew/time
Weight verification process (reduce disputes)
Quality-based payment incentives
snippets.outcome: Higher value catch, less waste.

snippets.title: Channel Power Upgrade
snippets.description: Stop being a price taker.
snippets.objective: Diversify buyers and sell on value/grade.
steps: Grade-based pricing table (visible to team)
Diversify channels: processors, retailers, restaurants, intermediaries
Simple contracts: volumes, grades, payment terms, claims rules
Proof pack: temp logs, handling SOPs, traceability
snippets.outcome: Better margins, reduced buyer risk.

snippets.title: Cost-Per-Kg Master Model
snippets.description: Know your true score.
snippets.objective: Calculate fully loaded cost per kg to drive pricing and efficiency.
steps: Fully loaded cost: feed + seed + labor + energy + health + depreciation + transport + ice
Weekly "expected margin vs actual margin"
Identify top 3 drivers and set weekly targets
snippets.outcome: Data-driven decisions on pricing and cost control.

snippets.title: Cash Discipline Wall
snippets.description: Protect the cash.
snippets.objective: Prevent leakage and ensure liquidity.
steps: Role separation: purchase, store, approve, pay
Feed/ice/fuel reconciliations weekly
Buyer receivables tracker + follow-up cadence
Farmer/supplier payment calendar to protect supply
snippets.outcome: Reduced fraud, improved cashflow.

snippets.title: Uptime & Maintenance Discipline
snippets.description: Keep the system running.
snippets.objective: Prevent disastrous failure of aeration, power, or cold chain.
steps: Preventive maintenance schedule (aerators, pumps, generators, chillers, nets)
Critical spares kit + downtime log
Power backup drills + response time KPI
Compliance calendar (permits, lab tests, audits)
snippets.outcome: High uptime, reduced emergency costs, safety compliance.

snippets.title: Lead Follow-up Cadence
snippets.description: Implement a follow-up cadence (stop losing "warm" leads).

snippets.title: Quote Scope Shield
snippets.description: Standardize quotes with scope boundaries and acceptance criteria.

snippets.title: Post-Delivery Referral
snippets.description: Launch post-delivery referral/testimonial capture.

snippets.title: Margin Floor Rule
snippets.description: Set a margin floor and enforce it on new quotes.

snippets.title: Change Order Fee Trigger
snippets.description: Introduce standard change-order fees for the top 5 common changes.

snippets.title: Procurement Deposit Rule
snippets.description: Tie deposits to procurement (no deposit, no buying).

snippets.title: Daily Plan Huddle
snippets.description: Run daily 10-minute plan vs actual huddles with reason codes.

snippets.title: WIP Limit Cap
snippets.description: Cap WIP—stop starting new jobs until bottleneck clears.

snippets.title: Quick PM Checks
snippets.description: Implement quick PM checks for top failure machines/tools.

snippets.title: Stock Cycle Count
snippets.description: Cycle-count top 30 fast movers and set min/max.

snippets.title: Job Costing Closeout
snippets.description: Close out last 5 jobs with actual cost and margin.

snippets.title: WIP Aging List
snippets.description: Build WIP aging list; prioritize oldest to cash first.

snippets.title: Bottleneck Skill Matrix
snippets.description: Build a skill matrix for the bottleneck station; train a backup.

snippets.title: 5S Sprint
snippets.description: Run a 5S sprint on the highest-traffic area.

snippets.title: Near Miss Reporting
snippets.description: Start near miss reporting with 48-hour closure targets.

snippets.title: Ready-to-Sell Spec Card
snippets.text: Define target weight/condition/age, acceptable health status, preferred buyer, expected price range, and negotiation floor.

snippets.title: Breeding Window Reset
snippets.text: Set a defined exposure period and track outcomes; tighten calving season to match feed peak.

snippets.title: 7-Day Feed Plan Sheet
snippets.text: Planned feed sources, quantities, mineral schedule, water checks; includes a buffer line.

snippets.title: Daily 10-Minute Herd Scan
snippets.text: Appetite, movement, breathing, manure, social behavior; pull-and-pen rule.

snippets.title: Secure Count Routine
snippets.text: Same time, same method, recorded; investigate variance same day.

snippets.title: Daily Stand-up
snippets.text: 7 minutes: yesterday losses, today priorities, one risk, one fix.

snippets.title: Loss Ledger
snippets.text: Every loss becomes a line item (theft, mortality, shrink, discount).

snippets.title: Minimum Viable Records (MVR)
snippets.text: Births, deaths, treatments, sales, feed purchases, headcount.

snippets.title: Build a Price Floor
snippets.description: Set minimum acceptable price per grade (breeder/finisher/cull) using last 10 sales + costs.
snippets.objective: Stop selling below cost and negotiate from a number, not emotion.
snippets.outcome: Protected margins and consistent pricing strategy.

snippets.title: Grade Your Animals Weekly
snippets.description: Tag/group into 3 buckets: sell now, finish 2–4 weeks, breeder/keep.
snippets.objective: Stop selling high-value breeders accidentally.
snippets.outcome: Maximize value per animal by selling at the right time.

snippets.title: Controlled Breeding Window
snippets.description: Separate male access for 45–60 days, then remove.
snippets.objective: Births cluster into manageable seasons with better feed availability.
snippets.outcome: Reduced mortality and streamlined management.

snippets.title: Implement a Cull Rule
snippets.description: Any female with repeated loss/poor mothering/infertility gets flagged for sale.
snippets.objective: Herd productivity rises without increasing costs.
snippets.outcome: Higher average herd performance and lower feed waste.

snippets.title: Priority Group Feeding
snippets.description: Separate weaners + late pregnancy/lactation for targeted supplementation.
snippets.objective: Kid/lamb survival improves and females recover faster.
snippets.outcome: Better growth rates and reproductive performance.

snippets.title: Feed Wastage Control
snippets.description: Use troughs, cover feed, store off ground, measure daily feed-out.
snippets.objective: Feed cost per animal drops without reducing performance.
snippets.outcome: Immediate reduction in feed expenses.

snippets.title: Daily 5-Minute Health Scan
snippets.description: Check appetite, posture, coat, breathing, manure, limping daily.
snippets.objective: Illness gets treated early and cheaply.
snippets.outcome: Reduced mortality and lower veterinary costs.

snippets.title: Weekly Escape Prevention Walk
snippets.description: Walk fences, check gates, water points, and weak corners.
snippets.objective: Escapes and theft opportunities drop.
snippets.outcome: Secure assets and reduced stress.

snippets.title: Daily Operations Checklist
snippets.description: Implement a tick-box list for feed/water/health/security/records.
snippets.objective: Routine compliance rises and problems reduce.
snippets.outcome: Consistent operations and standard work.

snippets.title: Separate Farm & Home Money
snippets.description: Create separate cash containers or accounts for farm operations and household.
snippets.objective: True profit becomes visible.
snippets.outcome: Clear financial visibility and better cash management.

snippets.title: Start 4-Record System
snippets.description: Track Births, Deaths, Treatments, Sales on separate pages.
snippets.objective: Identify top mothers and loss patterns.
snippets.outcome: Data-driven decisions replacing guesswork.

snippets.title: Day 1 Profit Reality Check: 14-day margin split and loss-maker map
snippets.description: Create immediate margin visibility by separating phones, accessories, and repairs, then identifying low-margin high-return SKUs.
steps: Owner or Finance Manager pulls last 14 days of transactions and groups by phones, accessories, repairs.
Pricing Analyst identifies top 20 SKUs and top 10 loss-makers (low margin plus high return profile).
Store Manager starts daily gross-profit log including discounts, payment fees, and expected gross margin.
snippets.objective: Replace sales-only visibility with true profit visibility.
snippets.outcome: Daily profit reality baseline is live and leak candidates are named.

snippets.title: Day 2 Stop Discount Bleed: discount approval matrix and 3 bundle closes
snippets.description: Move from random discounting to governed discount bands with pre-priced Basic, Better, Best bundle options.
steps: Finance Manager publishes discount limits by role and price band.
Sales Lead deploys three approved bundle closes at POS and chat channels.
Shift Leads log every discount exception with reason and approving role.
snippets.objective: Protect gross margin while preserving close rate.
snippets.outcome: Discount drift drops and bundles replace ad-hoc markdown behavior.

snippets.title: Day 3 Attach Rate Sprint: mandatory offers and checkout prompts
snippets.description: Standardize accessory and service offers for every phone transaction to increase basket value.
steps: Sales Manager enforces two mandatory offers: protector and case, then charger as conditional prompt.
POS Attendant uses add-on prompts at checkout and records acceptance.
Store Manager reviews attach-rate leaderboard by rep at end of day.
snippets.objective: Increase margin per transaction without price wars.
snippets.outcome: Attach rate rises with visible rep-level accountability.

snippets.title: Day 4 Stock Accuracy Shock Test: high-value count and variance lock
snippets.description: Run a focused cycle count on high-value phones and fast accessories, then close custody gaps immediately.
steps: Inventory Controller runs 90-minute cycle count on highest-value SKUs.
Store Manager tags variances by cause (miscount, process gap, suspected theft).
Loss Prevention or Supervisor updates lock-access and handover controls for exposed areas.
snippets.objective: Re-establish inventory truth and remove immediate shrink openings.
snippets.outcome: Variance root causes are visible and first-layer controls are active.

snippets.title: Day 5 Used Phone Trust Shield: test checklist plus grading label and IMEI checks
snippets.description: Standardize used-device trust controls with visible grading, repeatable testing, and device status verification.
steps: QA Technician applies 25-point test before display or resale release.
Refurb Specialist assigns A, B, or C grade label with pricing band reference.
Intake Officer logs IMEI or MEID and performs status checks where available.
snippets.objective: Reduce trust failures and avoidable used-device disputes.
snippets.outcome: Used sales become evidence-backed and policy-safe.

snippets.title: Day 6 Repairs Workflow Cleanup: intake to handover stage control
snippets.description: Enforce repair ticketing with quote approval gates, QA checks, and proactive status updates.
steps: Repair Technician logs every job with intake condition and expected completion window.
Service Desk obtains quote approval (signature or OTP) before part replacement.
Team sends two daily updates (morning and evening) until handover complete.
snippets.objective: Shrink repair disputes and reduce rework loops.
snippets.outcome: Repair pipeline becomes predictable with lower comeback risk.

snippets.title: Day 7 Reputation and Repeat Boost: review ask plus post-purchase follow-up
snippets.description: Capture immediate trust signals by requesting reviews and running a 24-72 hour follow-up cadence.
steps: Customer Service asks every satisfied buyer for a review using QR and message template.
Sales Rep sends follow-up message asking setup outcome and support needs.
Store Manager logs complaints and enforces response SLA.
snippets.objective: Convert transaction success into reputation and repeat demand.
snippets.outcome: Review flow and customer recovery loop are operational.

snippets.title: Week 1 Standardize: SOP baseline and role scorecards
snippets.description: Standardize core workflows: intake/testing, bundles, discounts, returns, repairs, and cash-up routines.
steps: General Manager signs off SOP library with owner per workflow.
Department Leads publish role scorecards and minimum standards.
Weekly audit verifies compliance and closes corrective actions.
snippets.objective: Move execution from memory-driven to system-driven.
snippets.outcome: Core processes are documented, owned, and audited.

snippets.title: Week 2 Inventory and Shrink System: ABC counts and access discipline
snippets.description: Implement ABC cycle counts, high-value custody controls, and reorder points for top sellers.
steps: Inventory Controller runs A weekly, B monthly, C quarterly cycle-count schedule.
Supervisor enforces high-value access log with dual sign-off where needed.
Procurement sets reorder points and min-max levels for fast movers.
snippets.objective: Increase availability and reduce inventory leakage.
snippets.outcome: Inventory system supports both control and throughput.

snippets.title: Week 3 Finance and Visibility: true margin calculator plus rolling cash forecast
snippets.description: Operationalize true margin calculations, 4-week cash forecast, and supplier-aging review cadence.
steps: Finance Manager builds true-margin model with labor, parts, fees, and warranty impacts.
Accountant maintains 4-week rolling cashflow view and weekly variance review.
Leadership reviews supplier aging and payment priority against stock risk.
snippets.objective: Protect cashflow and pricing quality under real cost structure.
snippets.outcome: Management decisions are grounded in verified margin and cash position.

snippets.title: Week 4 Growth Engine: referral program, inventory-linked promo calendar, trust messaging
snippets.description: Scale controlled growth with referral mechanics, promo planning tied to inventory goals, and repairability trust cues.
steps: Marketing Lead launches referral give-get structure with redemption tracking.
Merchandising Lead aligns monthly promotions to dead-stock and margin targets.
Sales and Service teams embed trust messaging: warranty clarity, QA proof, and repair options.
snippets.objective: Build repeatable growth without panic discounting.
snippets.outcome: Demand engine is measurable and aligned with profit control.

snippets.title: P1 Offer Snippet: Good-Better-Best bundle builder with margin bands
snippets.description: Deploy a structured bundle template: phone, case, protector, charger with tiered pricing logic.
steps: Merchandiser drafts three bundle tiers with minimum margin thresholds.
Sales Manager trains reps to present all tiers before single-item pricing.
Pricing Analyst reviews weekly conversion and margin by tier.
snippets.objective: Increase AOV while protecting margin floor.
snippets.outcome: Bundle strategy is repeatable and auditable.

snippets.title: P2 Demand Snippet: source-to-margin campaign tracker
snippets.description: Track source, lead, sale, and margin per campaign to replace visibility metrics with profitability metrics.
steps: Performance Marketer tags every campaign and channel source code.
Sales Ops logs conversion and gross profit by lead source.
Weekly review kills low-margin campaigns and scales proven offers.
snippets.objective: Align marketing spend to profitable demand.
snippets.outcome: Campaign decisions become evidence-led.

snippets.title: P3 Sales Snippet: seven-question needs analysis and three-option close script
snippets.description: Standardize discovery and close behavior across in-store and DM channels.
steps: Sales Lead introduces seven-question discovery script for every lead.
Reps close with three-option structure and explicit warranty proof.
Daily huddle reviews objection patterns and script adherence.
snippets.objective: Improve conversion quality and reduce avoidable returns.
snippets.outcome: Sales execution variance drops across reps.

snippets.title: P4 Operations Snippet: repair ticketing, approval proof, and QA gate library
snippets.description: Install full repair control library from intake photos through QA handover evidence.
steps: Service Manager maps stages and max WIP per stage.
Technicians attach approval proof before part swap.
QA Technician validates final checklist before customer handover.
snippets.objective: Create predictable repair throughput with lower rework.
snippets.outcome: Repair operations become measurable and dispute-safe.

snippets.title: P5 Finance Snippet: daily cash-up variance log and discount approval workflow
snippets.description: Run close-of-day reconciliation with explicit variance coding and discount authorization evidence.
steps: Cashier closes shift with POS-cash variance capture.
Store Manager approves variance closure steps same day.
Finance reviews discount outliers by rep weekly.
snippets.objective: Remove silent cash and discount leakage.
snippets.outcome: Cash control and discount discipline are visible daily.

snippets.title: P6 People Snippet: weekly two-hour training and balanced incentive plan
snippets.description: Institutionalize weekly capability cadence and incentives tied to profit-safe behavior.
steps: HR or Store Manager runs weekly two-hour training agenda (products, scripts, fraud controls).
Role scorecards track attach, returns, and review quality per staff.
Incentives rebalance from volume-only to quality-margin outcomes.
snippets.objective: Stabilize execution quality and reduce turnover-driven drift.
snippets.outcome: Team behavior aligns with margin and trust goals.

snippets.title: P7 Trust Snippet: warranty clarity pack, review response SLA, and customer-save SOP
snippets.description: Systematize trust protection through clear policy language, response discipline, and escalation controls.
steps: Warranty and Returns Officer publishes plain-language warranty card with exclusions.
Customer Service responds to reviews within defined SLA window.
Store Manager runs customer-save escalation for high-risk complaints.
snippets.objective: Reduce trust volatility and preserve referral engine.
snippets.outcome: Trust control becomes routine, documented, and measurable.

snippets.title: Workmanship Photo Guide
snippets.description: Create a simple pass/fail photo guide for the top 5 defects.

snippets.title: Harness ID + Rev Standard
snippets.description: Standardize labeling (ID + rev + date) at one print source.

snippets.title: Test Record Linkage
snippets.description: Make test a real gate: no ship without ID-linked result.

snippets.title: Pack A: Lamb Survival Lock
snippets.description: Stop the #1 profit leak: lambs dying before wean.
snippets.objective: Increase lambs weaned per ewe.
steps: Create a "Lambing Watchlist" for ewes due in 2 weeks.
Prepare a clean, dry lambing area (sanitized pen or designated clean paddock).
Implement AM/PM lamb check routine (warmth, colostrum intake, hygiene).
Ensure "naval dip" (iodine) for every newborn to prevent infection.
snippets.outcome: Lambing register + higher survival rate.

snippets.title: Pack B: Worm Pressure Breaker
snippets.description: Worms steal months of growth. Break the cycle now.
snippets.objective: Reduce parasite burden and improve growth rates.
steps: Start a "Monitoring Routine" (FAMACHA/eye color checks + diarrhea scan).
Dose strategically based on weight (not guess) and symptoms.
Rotate pasture or resting areas to reduce reinfection risk.
Improve hygiene in night housing (clean bedding breaks the cycle).
snippets.outcome: Parasite log + lower drug costs + faster growth.

snippets.title: Pack C: Footrot & Mobility Recovery
snippets.description: Limping sheep don’t eat, don’t breed, and don’t grow.
snippets.objective: Eliminate footrot as a herd-wide issue.
steps: Inspect every sheep: Separate clean vs. infected.
Pare/trim infected hooves and apply treatment (spray/bath).
Force dry bedding control in night shelter (moisture = rot).
Run the "clean" flock through a preventive footbath.
snippets.outcome: Mobility restored + higher feed intake.

snippets.title: Pack D: Dry Season Feed Gap Shield
snippets.description: Prevent the "reset" where flock loses all its gained weight.
snippets.objective: Maintain BCS and survival through dry season.
steps: Calculate the "Feed Gap" (how many weeks of drought vs. available stored feed).
Secure roughage reserves (hay/silage/residues) NOW.
Purchase targeted supplements for high-priority groups (pregnant ewes, weaners).
Implement strict rationing (don’t waste feed on the ground).
snippets.outcome: Dry-season feed calendar + minimized weight loss.

snippets.title: Pack E: Flock Structure Optimizer
snippets.description: Stop feeding unproductive animals. Keep only earners.
snippets.objective: A flock composed of productive ewes and growing stock.
steps: Categorize the flock (Productive Ewes, Replacement Ewe Lambs, Rams, Fatteners).
Create a "Cull List" (barren >2 cycles, chronic sick, old, poor mothers).
Sell the Cull List to fund feed for the best animals.
Select replacements only from the best-performing mothers.
snippets.outcome: Flock map + cull list + higher margin per head.

snippets.title: Pack F: Market Grade Ladder
snippets.description: Stop selling "sheep". Start selling "Grades".
snippets.objective: Capture premiums for better animals.
steps: Define your Grades (e.g., Grade A Ram, Grade B Ewe, Feeder Lamb).
Sort animals into a "Sell Queue" based on readiness.
Check prices for specific grades (don’t ask "how much for a sheep").
Time sales around demand peaks (festivals, school fees) if possible.
snippets.outcome: Price tracker + sell queue + better negotiation power.

snippets.title: Pack G: Security & Loss Shield
snippets.description: Stop silent theft and predator losses.
snippets.objective: 100% accountability for every animal.
steps: Tag or mark every sheep (unique ID or flock mark).
Implement a "Night Count" routine (in) and "Morning Count" routine (out).
Reinforce the night enclosure (fix holes, add locks, lighting).
Reconcile movement log weekly (Deaths - Sales + Births = Count).
snippets.outcome: Reconciliation sheet + secure perimeter.

snippets.title: Pack H: Wool Value Capture
snippets.description: Turn wool from waste into a bonus income stream.
snippets.objective: Clean, quality wool that buyers accept.
steps: Schedule shearing before wool gets ruined (timing is key).
Control shearing hygiene (clean floor, avoid contamination).
Sort wool by quality (separate belly/dirty wool from fleece).
Store properly (dry, pest-free) until sale.
snippets.outcome: Wool quality checklist + sales record.

snippets.title: 7-Day Fast Wins: Stabilize Profit
snippets.description: Stop the bleeding. Get control of the flock and cash.
snippets.objective: Immediate rapid control of chaos.
steps: Day 1: Count & Categorize. Build the Flock List.
Day 2: "Do Not Sell" List (Protects Breeders) vs "Sell Candidates" (Culls).
Day 3: Water & Feed Lock (Stop waste, ensure access). Separate lambs.
Day 4: Isolation. Pull sick animals OUT. Start Treatment Log.
Day 5: Lamb Survival. Set AM/PM checks. Clean one lambing corner.
Day 6: Feet & Fences. Treat limping sheep. Fix one major fence hole.
Day 7: Cash & Reinvest. Separate farm cash. Buy one critical supply (dewormer/salt).
snippets.outcome: Flock counted, sick isolated, cash flow separated.

snippets.title: 30-Day System: Build Control
snippets.description: Install the habits that make profit inevitable.
snippets.objective: A predictable, system-managed sheep business.
steps: Week 1: Measurement. Tag sheep. Start KPI tracking (Mortality, Cost/Ewe).
Week 2: Feed & Grazing. Start rotation plan. Secure dry season reserves.
Week 3: Bio-Security. Worm/Health calendar. Footrot routine. Quarantine rules.
Week 4: Breeding & Cycles. Ram control. Lamb growth targets. Monthly financial review.
snippets.outcome: Functioning management system with data visibility.

snippets.title: Price Intelligence Loop (7 Days)
snippets.description: Stop selling blind. Establish a routine to track market prices.
steps: Identify 3 reference markets (e.g., local hub, district center, processor gate).
Collect prices 2x/week for your specific crop and grade.
Record prices in a simple logbook or Excel sheet.
Set a "Minimum Selling Price" threshold based on your costs.

snippets.title: Price Intelligence Loop (30 Days)
snippets.description: Embed price tracking into your sales strategy.
steps: Maintain the 2x/week price collection routine.
Visualize price trends on a wall chart or dashboard.
Use price data to negotiate confidence with buyers.
Review sales performance against market averages monthly.

snippets.title: Crop Profit Calculator (7 Days)
snippets.description: Know your break-even to stop losing money on every acre.
steps: List all inputs per acre (Seed, Fertilizer, Chemicals, Labor).
Assign current unit costs to every input.
Estimate yield bands (Low, Medium, High) based on history.
Calculate Break-Even Price and Gross Margin per acre.

snippets.title: Crop Profit Calculator (30 Days)
snippets.description: Refine your financial model with actuals.
steps: Update the calculator with actual spend as the season progresses.
Compare "Budget vs Actual" for key cost lines.
Adjust sales targets if costs rise significantly.
Produce a 1-page P&L for your top 2 crops.

snippets.title: Season Task Calendar (7 Days)
snippets.description: Kill delays. Map out critical operations to avoid "firefighting".
steps: Map planting dates for all plots.
Mark critical windows: Weeding 1, Weeding 2, Fertilizer Application.
Identify spray windows based on crop stage.
Assign a specific owner to each task block.

snippets.title: Season Task Calendar (30 Days)
snippets.description: Execute the plan and track adherence.
steps: Post the calendar where the team can see it.
Hold a Weekly Start-of-Week meeting to review upcoming tasks.
Track "Planned vs Actual" completion dates.
Adjust the calendar for weather events immediately.

snippets.title: Input Control (7 Days)
snippets.description: Stop fake inputs and stockouts.
steps: Create an "Approved Supplier List" with verified vendors.
Start a "Receipt & Batch Log" for every input purchase.
Designate a locked storage area for chemicals and seeds.
Implement an "Issue Log" to track what goes to which plot.

snippets.title: Input Control (30 Days)
snippets.description: Systematize inventory management.
steps: Conduct a weekly stock take of all inputs.
Reconcile "Issued" vs "Remaining" stock.
Establish re-order points to avoid emergency trips.
Review supplier performance on quality and delivery.

snippets.title: Field Quality Checks (7 Days)
snippets.description: Stop spacing and mixing mistakes in the field.
steps: Define "Standard of Work" for Spacing, Weeding, and Spraying.
Create a simple "Daily Spot Check" checklist.
Assign a supervisor to check work *during* execution, not after.
Require photo evidence of good/bad examples.

snippets.title: Field Quality Checks (30 Days)
snippets.description: Build a culture of "Right First Time".
steps: Track Rework Rate weekly.
Retrain workers who consistently miss standards.
Reward teams with the lowest rework/error rate.
Maintain an "Exception Log" for all field issues.

snippets.title: Post-Harvest Loss Kill Switch (7 Days)
snippets.description: Cut losses fast. Protect your harvest value.
steps: Set strict moisture/maturity standards for harvesting.
Define sorting rules (Grade A, B, Rejects).
Establish a "Post-Harvest Handling SOP" (shade, crates, tarps).
Inspect storage areas for pests/leaks and fix immediately.

snippets.title: Post-Harvest Loss Kill Switch (30 Days)
snippets.description: Institutionalize quality control.
steps: Record all losses in a "Loss Log" (Spillage, Spoilage, Theft).
Monitor storage conditions (temp/moisture) weekly.
Train all handlers on the new SOPs.
Track "Grade Distribution" for every harvest batch.

snippets.title: Transport & Payment Protection (7 Days)
snippets.description: Stop weight and payment games.
steps: Draft a simple agreement for Transport (Cost, Timing, Liability).
Verify and record weights *at the farm* before loading.
Require a signed "Proof of Delivery" for every shipment.
Create a "Buyer Ledger" to track what is owed vs paid.

snippets.title: Transport & Payment Protection (30 Days)
snippets.description: Secure your revenue stream.
steps: Review all open invoices weekly.
Implement a script for following up on late payments.
Evaluate transporter performance (Damage, Delays).
Resolve any "Short Payment" disputes immediately with data.

snippets.title: Risk Playbook (7 Days)
snippets.description: Reduce shock damage with preparation.
steps: Start a "Weekly Scouting" routine for pests/disease.
Define "Action Thresholds" (e.g., if >10% plants affected, spray).
Prepare a "Response Kit" (chemicals/tools) for common threats.
Check drainage/irrigation readiness for weather shocks.

snippets.title: Risk Playbook (30 Days)
snippets.description: Build long-term farm resilience.
steps: Maintain the scouting log and review trends.
Update the playbook based on what you see in the field.
Build a small "Shock Buffer" (cash or savings) for emergencies.
Ensure compliance with any chemical handling/safety rules.

snippets.title: Draft 1-Page SLA Template (Cold Chain + Silo variants)
Launch Inbound Receiving Checklist + Photo Rule
Enforce Lot/Batch ID + Location ID from Day One
Set Up Quarantine / Hold Zone SOP
Standardize Document Pack (Packing List, GRN, CoA, Temp Log)
Map Temperature Sensors + Set Alarm Thresholds + Escalation Contacts
Implement Door Discipline Play (Strip Curtains, Door-Time Targets)
Create Excursion Response Script (Isolate → Verify → Document → Notify)
Launch Weekly Moisture & Temperature Check Plan (Silos)
Build Pest Control Calendar (Inspection, Cleaning, Baiting, Treatment)
Set Up Dock Scheduling Board (Time Slots, Priorities)
Define Slotting Rules (Fast Movers Near Dispatch, Fragile by Handling)
Launch Cycle Count Rhythm (A-Weekly, B-Biweekly, C-Monthly)
Implement Dispatch Accuracy Gate (Scan/Verify Before Loading)
Build Preventive Maintenance Calendar (Refrigeration, Generators, Fans, Forklifts)
Create Calibration Register (Device, Frequency, Last Date, Certificate)
Implement Energy Control Moves (Night Curtains, Defrost Tuning, Demand Tracking)
Build Incident-to-SOP Loop (Every Incident → Rule Change, Not Just Report)

snippets.action: Site survey checklist before quoting installs
No work without signed Work Order
Check parts availability before confirming date
Root cause review on every repeat visit
Standardize checklists for all common jobs
Enforce deposits for all major jobs
Move job logs to central system/paper
Photos + test readings on every closeout

snippets.title: SKU-Size Truth + Top-20 Fast Mover Counts
SKU-Size Matrix + Reorder Triggers by Size/Color
No Tag No Floor + Tagging Station Discipline
Fitting Room Count-In-Out + Damage Prevention Rule
Try-On Styling Flow + Fitting Conversion Tracking
Dead Stock Markdown Ladder + Bundle Recovery Plan
Category Margin Map + Price Rule Baseline
Weekly Profit Leak Review by Category
Daily Cash + Momo Reconciliation + Variance Log
Refund Approval Controls + Weekly Spot Audits
Supplier Terms Tracker + OTB Compliance Rhythm
Return Reason Coding + Return Loss Reduction Loop
VIP List + Weekly WhatsApp Follow-Up Rhythm
Outfit Bundle Board + Styling Script Launch
Drop Story Calendar + Channel Conversion Review
Leak Review Cadence + Action Closure Tracker
Delegation Limits for Discount and Refund Decisions
Private Label or Exclusive Sourcing Candidate List
Experience Upgrade Pilot (Styling Session + Size Guide)
Incentives Aligned to Margin + Low Returns
Staff Incentive Outcome Review by Role
Weekly Training Cadence + Service Script Audits
Kid Survival Lock (7 Days)
snippets.text: Create kidding watchlist. Clean kidding pen. Start early kid checks (warmth + hygiene).

snippets.title: Kid Survival Lock (30 Days)
snippets.text: Maintain kidding register. Execute kid survival checklist. Track weaning weights.

snippets.title: Parasite Breaker (7 Days)
snippets.text: Set monitoring routine. Check for anemia/diarrhea. Isolate sick goats immediately.

snippets.title: Parasite Breaker (30 Days)
snippets.text: Strategic deworming. Improve housing hygiene to reduce reinfection. Log treatment outcomes.

snippets.title: Feed Gap Shield (7 Days)
snippets.text: Forecast dry season. Plan reserves now. Locate hay/silage source. Reduce feed waste.

snippets.title: Feed Gap Shield (30 Days)
snippets.text: Build 30-day reserve. Supplement pregnant/lactating does/kids first. Track BCS stability.

snippets.title: Herd Structure & Cull (7 Days)
snippets.text: Categorize herd. Identify 'sell' candidates (old, sick, barren). Protect best does.

snippets.title: Herd Structure & Cull (30 Days)
snippets.text: Execute cull list. Select replacements from best mothers. Map herd structure against feed capacity.

snippets.title: Theft & Escape Control (7 Days)
snippets.text: Tag/mark all goats. Do a physical count. Fix weak fence points. Start movement log.

snippets.title: Theft & Escape Control (30 Days)
snippets.text: Monthly reconciliation count. Enforce night security. Log all exits/entries.

snippets.title: Market Grade Ladder (7 Days)
snippets.text: Define 3 grades (Premium, Standard, Cull). Check local prices. Sort sale goats by grade.

snippets.title: Market Grade Ladder (30 Days)
snippets.text: Build sell queue. Schedule sales for premium seasons (festivals). Track price per head.

snippets.title: Profit Stabilize (7 Days)
snippets.text: Reinvest in bottleleck (feed/health). Separate farm cash. Prepare budget.

snippets.title: Profit Control (30 Days)
snippets.text: Monthly financial review. Track costs per doe. Prove margin before expansion.

snippets.title: Routine Uptime (7 Days)
snippets.text: Protect critical tasks. Fix damp housing immediately. Assign roles.

snippets.title: Routine Uptime (30 Days)
snippets.text: Checklist for daily tasks. Maintain fences proactively. Regular feed/water checks.

snippets.title: Traceability Map Drill
snippets.description: Run a traceability drill: prove you can isolate affected batches within 30 minutes.

snippets.title: Label Control Lock
snippets.description: Lock label control: one approved artwork folder, one approval log.

snippets.title: Golden Batch Targets
snippets.description: Define "Golden Batch" targets for top 10 SKUs (pH/viscosity/active/fill).

snippets.title: Mixing Standard
snippets.description: Standardize order of addition + mixing time/temp and post it at the tank.

snippets.title: Promo ROI Check
snippets.description: Stop "blind promos": require a 1-page promo ROI check before discounting.

snippets.title: Returns Reason Triage
snippets.description: Start returns tracking by cause (leak, performance, irritation, fragrance dislike).

snippets.title: Low Margin Freeze
snippets.description: Identify bottom 20% SKUs by margin and freeze discounts on them.

snippets.title: Standard Cost Refresh
snippets.description: Update standard costs for top inputs (surfactants, fragrance, bottles, caps).

snippets.title: OEE Pilot
snippets.description: Start daily OEE tracking on the top line (one dashboard, reason codes).

snippets.title: Changeover Kits
snippets.description: Standardize changeovers (pre-stage all materials + checklist) and measure time.

snippets.title: Top 30 Cycle Count
snippets.description: Cycle-count top 30 items and fix record accuracy immediately.

snippets.title: Packaging Safety Stock
snippets.description: Create a "ship blockers list" (critical packaging parts) and set min/max.

snippets.title: Daily SQDC Huddle
snippets.description: Launch daily SQDC huddles that close 1–2 actions/day (no backlog).

snippets.title: Chemical Safety Sweep
snippets.description: Run a chemical safety sweep: SDS present, labels correct, storage segregated.

snippets.title: Incentive Alignment for Recovery and Loss Prevention
Create 'Golden Samples'
snippets.text: Choose one perfect example of each standard finish. Mount it on the wall. If a piece doesn't match, it doesn't ship.

snippets.title: Implement the 'Callback Log'
snippets.text: Track every return trip: Date, Cause, Cost (Time + Materials). Review weekly to kill the top recurring cause.

snippets.title: Standardize Drawer Box Details
snippets.text: Define one standard drawer box construction method. Stop re-engineering the basics for every custom job.

snippets.title: Redline Review Process
snippets.text: Before cutting, the lead carpenter reviews drawings with the designer to catch 'unbuildable' details.

snippets.title: Scope of Work Sign-off
snippets.text: Force a signature on a visual scope document (drawings + specs) before ordering materials.

snippets.title: Post-Install Walkthrough
snippets.text: Installer walks the client through the finished job, demonstrates features, and gets a signature on the punch-list.

snippets.title: True Hourly Rate Calculation
snippets.text: Calculate your shop's actual break-even hourly rate including overhead. Stop guessing.

snippets.title: Change Order Form Implementation
snippets.text: No more verbal changes. Every change gets a price and a signature before work starts.

snippets.title: Hardware Kitting First
snippets.text: Don't start cutting until all hardware is in a bin labeled with the job name.

snippets.title: Shadow Boarding 101
snippets.text: Outline every tool at the main bench. If it's missing, you know instantly. Stop the 'search and carry'.

snippets.title: Daily Dust-Down
snippets.text: Last 15 minutes of every shift is strictly for cleaning. A clean shop is a safe, high-quality shop.

snippets.title: Offcut Bin Rules
snippets.text: If it's smaller than X, pitch it. If it's bigger, rack it by size. Stop storing firewood.

snippets.title: Consumable Kan-Ban
snippets.text: Use a simple 2-bin system for screws, glue, and sandpaper. Never run out again.

snippets.title: Morning Safety Huddle
snippets.text: Start every day with 2 minutes on hazards and the plan for the day.

snippets.title: Skill Matrix Development
snippets.text: Map out who can do what (Cut, Edge, Assemble, Finish, Install). Identify reliance on 'heroes'.

snippets.title: Top Model Fitment Sheet + Substitute Options Matrix
Weekly Top-50 Cycle Count + Supplier Lead-Time Calendar
Urgent Order Response SLA + Dispatch Proof Routine
Category Margin Map + Baseline Price Rules
Garage Credit Policy + Debtor Aging List
Dead Stock KPI Cadence + Cash Release Tracker
Garage Account List + Repeat Follow-Up Cadence
Trust + Authenticity Proof Stack (Invoice, Warranty, Source)
Response SLA + Quote Templates for Urgent Buyers
KPI Wall: Wrong Fit, Returns, Debtors, Shrink, Stockouts
Weekly KPI Closure Rhythm + Leak Escalation Rules
Delegation Limits for Discounts, Returns, and Credits
Standards Coaching for Fitment, Labeling, and Pricing
Weekly SOP Audit + Repeat-Leak Elimination Loop
Job Kit Launch (Service, Brake, Clutch) + Bundle Pricing
Bundle Optimization by Model and Job Type
Test-to-Scale Rules for New Stock Lines
Warranty Claim Evidence and Decision Framework
High-Value Item Controls (Lock, Log, Access Rules)
Incentives Aligned to Margin + Low Wrong-Fit + Low Returns
One-Page Strategy Map
snippets.text: Define top 3 products, top 2 markets, and top 3 'no-go' deals (where you lose money).

snippets.title: Pre-Harvest Plan + RIL Checklist
snippets.text: Boundary verification, protected zones, skid trails, road plan, felling direction, landing locations.

snippets.title: Log Traceability Pack
snippets.text: Unique log/batch ID, harvest block, species, GPS, transport doc, yard receiving link.

snippets.title: Mill Recovery Command Center
snippets.text: Daily: log input volume, lumber output volume, value recovery, downtime reasons, rejects.

snippets.title: Moisture Control SOP
snippets.text: Target MC by market, sampling method, sticker spacing, storage rules, 'hold until stable'.

snippets.title: Timber Sales Contract Addendum
snippets.text: Grade/spec definitions, MC tolerance, claims window, inspection method, penalties.

snippets.title: Weekly Profit Review
snippets.text: Top 5 numbers: Recovery %, Value recovery, Downtime %, Cash on hand, Order backlog.

snippets.action: Audit all stock for correct language/safety data
Reorder Point = Lead Time + Seasonality + Safety
Analyze top returns reasons on Exception Dashboard
Set 3 selling triggers (min price, target, hold line)
Add lot ID + moisture record per sale
Do stand count + replant rules day 7–14
Switch to gentler crates + shade during staging
Weigh in/out each storage lot weekly
Calculate cost per kg per crop
Create weekly work plan + daily targets board
Pay bonuses for Grade A % not speed
Add drainage lines / mulching / stagger planting

snippets.title: Adulteration Shield
snippets.text: Standard intake testing (density/lactometer, alcohol test, acidity/pH, temperature, organoleptic checks). Clear reject protocol + documentation (no 'negotiation at the gate'). Farmer education: clean milking, no water addition, container hygiene. 'Test visible' culture: testing done in front of suppliers where appropriate. Repeat-offender rules + escalation ladder.

snippets.title: Temperature Lock
snippets.text: Immediate pre-chill temperature check at arrival. Batch tagging + time stamp. 'Time-to-chill' KPI tracked daily. Generator readiness: fuel, startup drill, weekly test. Insulated transport rules + max holding time SOP.

snippets.title: Spoilage & Shrink Zeroing
snippets.text: Daily reconciliation: liters in vs liters out vs liters spoiled. Identify loss points: transfer, filtration, valves, measurement methods, leaks. Calibrate measuring devices weekly (or per manufacturer). Clean-in-place (CIP) schedule + verification checklist.

snippets.title: Route Profit Engine
snippets.text: Route redesign: fewer dead-kilometers, cluster stops, fixed pickup windows. Simple dispatch board: planned liters vs actual liters per stop. Driver accountability: fuel logs + GPS where available. 'Late pickup = quality loss' enforcement.

snippets.title: Farmer Loyalty Engine
snippets.text: Predictable payment calendar + transparent pricing. Two-way communication: quality feedback per farmer. Micro-incentives: quality bonus, loyalty bonus, container cleanliness rewards. Handling complaints fast (payment, rejections, grading disputes).

snippets.title: Buyer Power Upgrade
snippets.text: Quality proof pack: daily test reports + traceability. Diversify buyers (2–4 channels): processor, hotel/retail, institutional, export where legal. Contract basics: volumes, quality specs, penalties, payment terms. Positioning: 'consistent cold chain + verified quality' sells at premium.

snippets.title: Cash Discipline Wall
snippets.text: Separate cash roles: receiving, recording, approving, paying. Daily cash + mobile money reconciliation. Farmer statement system (simple weekly SMS/printouts). Float buffer rule (e.g., hold X days operating expense).

snippets.title: Uptime & Maintenance Discipline
snippets.text: Preventive maintenance calendar (chiller, generator, pumps). Spare parts kit: seals, valves, hoses, filters, fuses. Downtime log + root cause + recurrence prevention. Vendor SLAs (service response time).

snippets.title: Supplier Prequalification Pack
snippets.text: Create a single, updated digital folder with your HSE, QA/QC, Integrity, Insurance, and key staff CVs. Assign one owner to keep it audit-ready weekly.

snippets.title: Subcontractor Screening Checklist
snippets.text: Implement a "No Onboarding, No Access" rule. Use a standard checklist (HSE alignment, competency, insurance) before any sub starts work.

snippets.title: Anti-Bribery Policy & Script
snippets.text: Deploy a simple 1-page "No Facilitation Payments" policy and a script for staff to refuse improper requests without losing face.

snippets.title: Audit Finding Tracker
snippets.text: Track every audit finding (Internal or Client) to closure with evidence. Review weekly to prevent "Audit Ambush".

snippets.title: SLA Menu & Dashboard
snippets.text: Define your service tiers (Standard vs Premium) with clear response times and deliverables. Use a dashboard to prove you hit them.

snippets.title: Value Proof Sheet
snippets.text: Create 1-page case studies showing "Before vs After" metrics (e.g., Downtime Avoided, Speed, Safety). Stop selling effort, start selling outcomes.

snippets.title: Cost-to-Serve Calculator
snippets.text: Map all costs including mobilization, standby, permits, and logistics. Use this to set accurate pricing floors.

snippets.title: Bid/No-Bid Checklist
snippets.text: Stop chasing every tender. improved your win-rate by scoring opportunities (Relationship, Capability, Margin) before you start work.

snippets.title: Top 30 Target List
snippets.text: Identify the top 30 accounts (Operators/EPCs) you want to win. Map the stakeholders and build a specific engagement plan.

snippets.title: Enterprise Capability Statement
snippets.text: Update your capability profile to focus on "Buyer Risks": emphasize HSE, QA, Financial Stability, and Audit Readiness.

snippets.title: Variation Order Form
snippets.text: Capture scope changes immediately. Even if you bill later, get signatures now. Stop doing free work.

snippets.title: Sales-to-Ops Handover Checklist
snippets.text: Ensure Operations knows exactly what was sold. detailed scope, exclusions, timelines, and safety requirements before work starts.

snippets.title: Discount Approval Matrix
snippets.text: Set clear margin floors. Require senior approval for any discount below the standard tier.

snippets.title: Mobilization Checklist
snippets.text: Standardize mobilization: Personnel certs, equipment checks, logistics, and permits. Eliminate "Gate Fever" delays.

snippets.title: Job Closeout Pack
snippets.text: Define the standard evidence required for invoicing (Time sheets, signed reports, photos, test charts). No pack = No invoice.

snippets.title: Critical Spares List
snippets.text: Identify the top 20 parts that cause downtime. Set reorder points and keep them in stock locally.

snippets.title: Emergency Freight Log
snippets.text: Track every emergency shipment. Record the cost and the root cause. Reduce "Emergency Tax" by fixing planning gaps.

snippets.title: Job Costing Sheet
snippets.text: Track revenue vs actual costs (labor, material, equipment, travel) for every job. Know your true margin.

snippets.title: Spend Approval Matrix
snippets.text: Freeze unapproved spend. Every PO requires a code and approval based on value limits.

snippets.title: WIP Tracker
snippets.text: Track Unbilled Work (WIP) weekly. Identify blockers (missing docs, PO limits) and clear them to unlock cash.

snippets.title: Competency Matrix
snippets.text: Map critical roles to required skills/certs. Track expiration dates and deployment readiness.

snippets.title: Start-Work Verification
snippets.text: Implement a field check that verifies critical controls are in place before high-risk work begins.

snippets.title: NCR & Learning Tracker
snippets.text: Log Quality Non-Conformances (NCRs) and incidents. Track actions to effectiveness, not just completion.

snippets.title: T7-01 Shrink Map (Weight checkpoints)
snippets.text: Install weight checkpoints at: 1) Pickup, 2) Depot Arrival, 3) Dispatch. Weekly variance report exposes where the leak is.

snippets.title: T7-02 Grade Standard Card + Training
snippets.text: Create a 1-page visual grade card (A/B/Reject) for field staff. Train them to grade at source, not just at the depot.

snippets.title: T7-03 Dispatch Slot Board
snippets.text: Install a simple whiteboard/schedule for dispatch slots. Buyers/Drivers must book a slot. No slot = wait.

snippets.title: T7-04 Truck Fill Rule + Trip Sheet
snippets.text: Enforce minimum fill % (e.g., 90%) before departure unless authorized. Use a Trip Sheet to track cost per kg.

snippets.title: T7-05 Hidden Fees Ledger
snippets.text: List every fee (market entry, loading, bribes, commissions) in one sheet. Calc the true sum per trip.

snippets.title: T7-06 Buyer Terms Reset (deposit/PO rules)
snippets.text: Draft standard terms: 50% deposit for new buyers, strict net-7 for existing. Stop verbal credit.

snippets.title: T7-07 Intake Checklist (defects/moisture/packing)
snippets.text: Reject bad produce at the gate. Check moisture, heat, and defects before you pay or store.

snippets.title: T7-08 Evidence Bundle (photos+weights+grade notes)
snippets.text: For every shipment: 3 photos (pack, truck, seal) + weight slip. Send to buyer before dispatch.

snippets.title: T7-09 Complaint Closure Log
snippets.text: Log every complaint. Rule: Acknowledge in 1 hour, resolve in 24 hours. Turn complaints into trust.

snippets.title: T7-10 Pre-sell Pilot
snippets.text: Try to sell 30% of next week's volume before you buy it. Lock prices early.

snippets.title: T7-11 Cash Control Routine (daily close)
snippets.text: End of day rule: Cash in hand MUST match receipts. Discrepancies logged immediately.

snippets.title: T7-12 Handling Standard (no bruising rule)
snippets.text: Train staff: 'Don't throw crates.' 'Don't overstack.' Simple visual rules to stop bruising.

snippets.title: T30-01 Route Profit Dashboard
snippets.text: Build a simple sheet tracking P&L per route/truck. Cut the losers, double down on winners.

snippets.title: T30-02 Supplier Tiering + Quality Score
snippets.text: Score your suppliers (A/B/C) on quality and reliability. Give A-list better terms/priority.

snippets.title: T30-03 Buyer Diversification Sprint
snippets.text: Target to find 3 new buyers to reduce reliance on your top client below 50%.

snippets.title: T30-04 Value-Add Pilot (grading/packing/branding)
snippets.text: Launch one value-add test: e.g., Pre-packed net bags, cleaned veg, or branded boxes.

snippets.title: T30-05 Institutional Contract Pilot
snippets.text: Pitch a standing weekly order to 1 school/hotel/factory. Lock in volume.

snippets.title: T30-06 Traceability Spine (lot tags + records)
snippets.text: Tag every batch with a Lot ID. Track it from farm to final invoice. Essential for export/contracts.

snippets.title: T30-07 Written Terms Templates
snippets.text: Digitize your contracts. Create a simple PDF template for Sales/Buying. Sign on glass or email.

snippets.title: T30-08 Quality Tier Pricing (A/B/C)
snippets.text: Stop flat pricing. Charge premium for Grade A, discount for Grade C. Capture the value of quality.

snippets.title: T30-09 Cold Chain Partner Pilot
snippets.text: Test a refrigerated truck or cold storage for 1 route. Measure if the reduced shrink pays for the cost.

snippets.title: T30-10 Agent Standards + Audit
snippets.text: Checklist for field agents. Spot check their grading. Align them to your standard.

snippets.title: T30-11 Incentives Align (quality + shrink)
snippets.text: Change bonus structure. Speed is good, but Speed + Low Shrink = Bonus. Penalize damage.

snippets.title: T30-12 Daily/Weekly Control Cadence
snippets.text: Mondays: Plan. Fridays: Review P&L. Daily: 15-min standup on Ops blockages.

snippets.title: T7-EXP-01 Forward Booking Plan
snippets.text: Create a 4-week rolling forecast for containers. Book slots >14 days out to secure rates.

snippets.title: T7-EXP-02 Pre-Clearance Checklist
snippets.text: Docs must be 100% ready BEFORE the container gate-in. Use a 'No Docs, No Load' rule.

snippets.title: T7-EXP-03 FX Buffer Policy
snippets.text: Price all deals with a 3-5% FX buffer or lock rate at invoice. Don't gamble on currency.

snippets.title: T7-EXP-04 Temp Recorder Protocol
snippets.text: Place temp recorders (e.g., Tympani) in every container. Photo evidence of placement required.

snippets.title: T30-EXP-01 Market Diversification Plan
snippets.text: Map 3 alternative markets/buyers. Send samples to 2 new prospects this month.

snippets.title: T30-EXP-02 Compliance Calendar
snippets.text: Map all cert renewals (GlobalGAP, etc.) on a wall calendar. Assign an owner for each.

snippets.title: T30-EXP-03 Export Contract Template
snippets.text: Standardize your sales contract. Define: Incoterms, Payment Terms, and Rejection/Claim procedure.

snippets.title: FCR / Feed-per-Tray Accelerator
snippets.text: Calibrate feeder height and flow to stop spillage. Enforce phase discipline (starter/grower/finisher). Record daily feed intake vs birds.

snippets.title: Brooding Perfection (0–14d)
snippets.text: Pre-heat house 24hr early. Ensure uniform water/feed access. Monitor chick behavior (not just temp). Fix drafts.

snippets.title: Biosecurity Wall
snippets.text: Restrict entry. Use house-specific boots. Isolate sick birds immediately. Enforcement dead bird disposal SOP.

snippets.title: Litter & Ammonia Control
snippets.text: Fix water leaks immediately. Remove wet spots daily. Tune ventilation to dry litter. Measure ammonia incidents.

snippets.title: Heat Stress Defense
snippets.text: Optimize airflow. Ensure water uptime. Adjust feeding times to cooler hours. Track heat-related mortality.

snippets.title: Egg Quality / Grade Ladder
snippets.text: Improve collection frequency. Handle gently to reduce cracks. Sort eggs/birds by grade. Target premium buyers.

snippets.title: Cashflow + Inventory Control
snippets.text: Weekly reconciliation of feed/stock. Separate farm cash. Protect critical budgets (feed/health) from withdrawals.

snippets.title: People & Checklist System
snippets.text: Implement daily checklists for all houses. Clarify roles. Hold weekly 15min KPI review meetings.

fixPlans7Day.title: Batch ID Tagging

fixPlans7Day.title: Golden Machine Setup

fixPlans7Day.title: Margin Floor Lockdown

fixPlans7Day.title: Simple Downtime Log

fixPlans7Day.title: Choke Point Count

fixPlans7Day.title: Dead Stock Release

tasks: Run mite counts on a sample; log results.

fixPlans7Day.title: Queen-right + Weakness Cleanup

fixPlans7Day.title: Equipment & Super Readiness

Fix 10–20% of small failures causing downtime.

fixPlans7Day.title: Sales Quick Wins

fixPlans7Day.title: Control Loop
tasks: Lock weekly cadence: inspection, health test, prep, sales.
Write 1-page SOP: "How we inspect + record + decide."

fixPlans7Day.title: CTQ Spec Lock

fixPlans7Day.title: 15-Min Traceability Drill

fixPlans7Day.title: Golden Settings Sheet
fixPlans7Day.description: Create "golden settings" for top 10 SKUs and enforce shift handover.

fixPlans7Day.title: Startup Scrap Attack
fixPlans7Day.description: Measure startup scrap daily and attack the top 2 causes.

fixPlans7Day.title: RFQ Follow-up Rhythm
fixPlans7Day.description: Implement a follow-up cadence for RFQs and sampling.

fixPlans7Day.title: Capacity-Based Promises
fixPlans7Day.description: Tie promised lead times to capacity reality (stop expedite addiction).

fixPlans7Day.title: Margin Floor & Discount Freeze
fixPlans7Day.description: Identify bottom 20% margin SKUs and freeze discounts immediately.

fixPlans7Day.title: Resin Index Clause
fixPlans7Day.description: Add resin change clauses for new quotes (or shorten validity).

fixPlans7Day.title: Daily OEE Tracking
fixPlans7Day.description: Start daily OEE tracking with reason codes on top 2 lines.

fixPlans7Day.title: WIP Flush
fixPlans7Day.description: Cap WIP and clear the oldest work first to release cash.

fixPlans7Day.title: Standard Changeover
fixPlans7Day.description: Implement a standard changeover checklist and measure time.

fixPlans7Day.title: Stockout Killer (Min/Max)
fixPlans7Day.description: Cycle count top 30 items and set reorder points to kill stockouts.

fixPlans7Day.title: WIP-to-Cash List
fixPlans7Day.description: Build WIP aging list and prioritize "oldest-to-cash first."

fixPlans7Day.title: Pellet Loss Sweep
fixPlans7Day.description: Start a simple pellet loss prevention routine (sweep, containment).

fixPlans7Day.title: Bottleneck Backup Training
fixPlans7Day.description: Build a skill matrix for bottleneck roles and train one backup.

fixPlans7Day.title: Action-Closing Huddles
fixPlans7Day.description: Launch daily huddles that close 1–2 actions/day (no backlog growth).

fixPlans7Day.title: Mortality Spike Response
fixPlans7Day.description: Stop the bleeding fast.
fixPlans7Day.objective: Diagnose and contain outbreaks before they wipe out the crop.
steps: 30-minute drill: isolate, measure DO/temp/pH, inspect gills/behavior, check feed, check toxins
Sample capture for diagnosis
Stop feeding rule when critical parameters off
Post-mortem review: root cause + prevention

Fit-up & Weld Checklist
