fixPlans7Day.title: Weld Defect Kill List
fixPlans7Day.description: Choose top 3 recurring weld issues; tie them to one procedure + one inspection point.

fixPlans7Day.title: Hot Work Permit System
fixPlans7Day.description: Implement permits/fire watch for high-risk areas; remove combustibles.

fixPlans7Day.title: Job Readiness Gate
fixPlans7Day.description: No cutting/welding without complete pack (drawings, BOM, WPS).

fixPlans7Day.title: Drawing Review Checklist
fixPlans7Day.description: Standardize a drawing checklist (tolerances, weld symbols, finish, inspection notes).

fixPlans7Day.title: Operation Time Library
fixPlans7Day.description: Start a simple time library for the top 10 operations (cut/weld/grind).

fixPlans7Day.title: Lead Follow-up Cadence
fixPlans7Day.description: Implement a follow-up cadence (stop losing "warm" leads).

fixPlans7Day.title: Quote Scope Shield
fixPlans7Day.description: Standardize quotes with scope boundaries and acceptance criteria.

fixPlans7Day.title: Post-Delivery Referral
fixPlans7Day.description: Launch post-delivery referral/testimonial capture.

fixPlans7Day.title: Margin Floor Rule
fixPlans7Day.description: Set a margin floor and enforce it on new quotes.

fixPlans7Day.title: Change Order Fee Trigger
fixPlans7Day.description: Introduce standard change-order fees for the top 5 common changes.

fixPlans7Day.title: Procurement Deposit Rule
fixPlans7Day.description: Tie deposits to procurement (no deposit, no buying).

fixPlans7Day.title: Daily Plan Huddle
fixPlans7Day.description: Run daily 10-minute plan vs actual huddles with reason codes.

fixPlans7Day.title: WIP Limit Cap
fixPlans7Day.description: Cap WIP—stop starting new jobs until bottleneck clears.

fixPlans7Day.title: Quick PM Checks
fixPlans7Day.description: Implement quick PM checks for top failure machines/tools.

fixPlans7Day.title: Stock Cycle Count
fixPlans7Day.description: Cycle-count top 30 fast movers and set min/max.

fixPlans7Day.title: Job Costing Closeout
fixPlans7Day.description: Close out last 5 jobs with actual cost and margin.

fixPlans7Day.title: WIP Aging List
fixPlans7Day.description: Build WIP aging list; prioritize oldest to cash first.

fixPlans7Day.title: Bottleneck Skill Matrix
fixPlans7Day.description: Build a skill matrix for the bottleneck station; train a backup.

fixPlans7Day.title: 5S Sprint
fixPlans7Day.description: Run a 5S sprint on the highest-traffic area.

fixPlans7Day.title: Near Miss Reporting
fixPlans7Day.description: Start near miss reporting with 48-hour closure targets.

fixPlans7Day.title: 7-Day "Stabilize Profit" Plan
fixPlans7Day.description: Fast wins to stop leaks and regain control.

steps.action: Start Loss Ledger (mortality, theft, shrink, discounts). Do a full headcount and create a batch list.
Inspect feed storage; fix the biggest spoilage point first. Implement Feed Plan Sheet.
Launch Daily Herd Scan + sick pen rule. Set quarantine rule for any new animal.
Make Buyer Scorecard and rank top 5. Define one 'Ready-to-Sell Spec Card' for current batch.
Run weekly cash view; list bills that cause panic selling. Choose one action: renegotiate term OR plan a controlled sale.
Fix the single highest-risk operational issue (water uptime, broken fence section, unsafe loading point).
Baseline 8 KPIs: headcount, mortality, feed spend, water uptime, sales price/kg, shrink %, cash buffer days.

fixPlans7Day.diagnosis: You are losing money to invisible leaks (mortality, waste, theft) and pricing panic.

evidenceSnapshots.whyItMatters: Wasted feed is money thrown away.

quickWins.title: Baseline Count
quickWins.desc: Count all animals by group (breeders, young, finishers, sick).

quickWins.title: Leak Hunt
quickWins.desc: List top 3 leaks (mortality, waste, theft) from last 30 days.

fixPlans7Day.winCondition: You know exactly what you own, where you lose money, and have stopped the daily bleeding.

kpi.name: Weekly Loss Count
kpi.def: Number of animals dead or missing per week.

traps: Blaming bad luck instead of systems

fixPlans7Day.title: Day 1 Profit Reality Check: 14-day margin split and loss-maker map
fixPlans7Day.description: Create immediate margin visibility by separating phones, accessories, and repairs, then identifying low-margin high-return SKUs.
steps: Owner or Finance Manager pulls last 14 days of transactions and groups by phones, accessories, repairs.
Pricing Analyst identifies top 20 SKUs and top 10 loss-makers (low margin plus high return profile).
Store Manager starts daily gross-profit log including discounts, payment fees, and expected gross margin.
fixPlans7Day.objective: Replace sales-only visibility with true profit visibility.
fixPlans7Day.outcome: Daily profit reality baseline is live and leak candidates are named.

fixPlans7Day.title: Day 2 Stop Discount Bleed: discount approval matrix and 3 bundle closes
fixPlans7Day.description: Move from random discounting to governed discount bands with pre-priced Basic, Better, Best bundle options.
steps: Finance Manager publishes discount limits by role and price band.
Sales Lead deploys three approved bundle closes at POS and chat channels.
Shift Leads log every discount exception with reason and approving role.
fixPlans7Day.objective: Protect gross margin while preserving close rate.
fixPlans7Day.outcome: Discount drift drops and bundles replace ad-hoc markdown behavior.

fixPlans7Day.title: Day 3 Attach Rate Sprint: mandatory offers and checkout prompts
fixPlans7Day.description: Standardize accessory and service offers for every phone transaction to increase basket value.
steps: Sales Manager enforces two mandatory offers: protector and case, then charger as conditional prompt.
POS Attendant uses add-on prompts at checkout and records acceptance.
Store Manager reviews attach-rate leaderboard by rep at end of day.
fixPlans7Day.objective: Increase margin per transaction without price wars.
fixPlans7Day.outcome: Attach rate rises with visible rep-level accountability.

fixPlans7Day.title: Day 4 Stock Accuracy Shock Test: high-value count and variance lock
fixPlans7Day.description: Run a focused cycle count on high-value phones and fast accessories, then close custody gaps immediately.
steps: Inventory Controller runs 90-minute cycle count on highest-value SKUs.
Store Manager tags variances by cause (miscount, process gap, suspected theft).
Loss Prevention or Supervisor updates lock-access and handover controls for exposed areas.
fixPlans7Day.objective: Re-establish inventory truth and remove immediate shrink openings.
fixPlans7Day.outcome: Variance root causes are visible and first-layer controls are active.

fixPlans7Day.title: Day 5 Used Phone Trust Shield: test checklist plus grading label and IMEI checks
fixPlans7Day.description: Standardize used-device trust controls with visible grading, repeatable testing, and device status verification.
steps: QA Technician applies 25-point test before display or resale release.
Refurb Specialist assigns A, B, or C grade label with pricing band reference.
Intake Officer logs IMEI or MEID and performs status checks where available.
fixPlans7Day.objective: Reduce trust failures and avoidable used-device disputes.
fixPlans7Day.outcome: Used sales become evidence-backed and policy-safe.

fixPlans7Day.title: Day 6 Repairs Workflow Cleanup: intake to handover stage control
fixPlans7Day.description: Enforce repair ticketing with quote approval gates, QA checks, and proactive status updates.
steps: Repair Technician logs every job with intake condition and expected completion window.
Service Desk obtains quote approval (signature or OTP) before part replacement.
Team sends two daily updates (morning and evening) until handover complete.
fixPlans7Day.objective: Shrink repair disputes and reduce rework loops.
fixPlans7Day.outcome: Repair pipeline becomes predictable with lower comeback risk.

fixPlans7Day.title: Day 7 Reputation and Repeat Boost: review ask plus post-purchase follow-up
fixPlans7Day.description: Capture immediate trust signals by requesting reviews and running a 24-72 hour follow-up cadence.
steps: Customer Service asks every satisfied buyer for a review using QR and message template.
Sales Rep sends follow-up message asking setup outcome and support needs.
Store Manager logs complaints and enforces response SLA.
fixPlans7Day.objective: Convert transaction success into reputation and repeat demand.
fixPlans7Day.outcome: Review flow and customer recovery loop are operational.

fixPlans7Day.title: P1 Offer Snippet: Good-Better-Best bundle builder with margin bands
fixPlans7Day.description: Deploy a structured bundle template: phone, case, protector, charger with tiered pricing logic.
steps: Merchandiser drafts three bundle tiers with minimum margin thresholds.
Sales Manager trains reps to present all tiers before single-item pricing.
Pricing Analyst reviews weekly conversion and margin by tier.
fixPlans7Day.objective: Increase AOV while protecting margin floor.
fixPlans7Day.outcome: Bundle strategy is repeatable and auditable.

fixPlans7Day.title: P3 Sales Snippet: seven-question needs analysis and three-option close script
fixPlans7Day.description: Standardize discovery and close behavior across in-store and DM channels.
steps: Sales Lead introduces seven-question discovery script for every lead.
Reps close with three-option structure and explicit warranty proof.
Daily huddle reviews objection patterns and script adherence.
fixPlans7Day.objective: Improve conversion quality and reduce avoidable returns.
fixPlans7Day.outcome: Sales execution variance drops across reps.

fixPlans7Day.title: P5 Finance Snippet: daily cash-up variance log and discount approval workflow
fixPlans7Day.description: Run close-of-day reconciliation with explicit variance coding and discount authorization evidence.
steps: Cashier closes shift with POS-cash variance capture.
Store Manager approves variance closure steps same day.
Finance reviews discount outliers by rep weekly.
fixPlans7Day.objective: Remove silent cash and discount leakage.
fixPlans7Day.outcome: Cash control and discount discipline are visible daily.

fixPlans7Day.title: 7-Day Fast Wins: Stabilize Profit
fixPlans7Day.description: Stop the bleeding. Get control of the flock and cash.
steps: Day 1: Count & Categorize. Build the Flock List.
Day 2: "Do Not Sell" List (Protects Breeders) vs "Sell Candidates" (Culls).
Day 3: Water & Feed Lock (Stop waste, ensure access). Separate lambs.
Day 4: Isolation. Pull sick animals OUT. Start Treatment Log.
Day 5: Lamb Survival. Set AM/PM checks. Clean one lambing corner.
Day 6: Feet & Fences. Treat limping sheep. Fix one major fence hole.
Day 7: Cash & Reinvest. Separate farm cash. Buy one critical supply (dewormer/salt).
fixPlans7Day.outcome: Flock counted, sick isolated, cash flow separated.

fixPlans7Day.title: Price Intelligence Loop (7 Days)
fixPlans7Day.description: Stop selling blind. Establish a routine to track market prices.
steps: Identify 3 reference markets (e.g., local hub, district center, processor gate).
Collect prices 2x/week for your specific crop and grade.
Record prices in a simple logbook or Excel sheet.
Set a "Minimum Selling Price" threshold based on your costs.

fixPlans7Day.title: Crop Profit Calculator (7 Days)
fixPlans7Day.description: Know your break-even to stop losing money on every acre.
steps: List all inputs per acre (Seed, Fertilizer, Chemicals, Labor).
Assign current unit costs to every input.
Estimate yield bands (Low, Medium, High) based on history.
Calculate Break-Even Price and Gross Margin per acre.

fixPlans7Day.title: Season Task Calendar (7 Days)
fixPlans7Day.description: Kill delays. Map out critical operations to avoid "firefighting".
steps: Map planting dates for all plots.
Mark critical windows: Weeding 1, Weeding 2, Fertilizer Application.
Identify spray windows based on crop stage.
Assign a specific owner to each task block.

fixPlans7Day.title: Input Control (7 Days)
fixPlans7Day.description: Stop fake inputs and stockouts.
steps: Create an "Approved Supplier List" with verified vendors.
Start a "Receipt & Batch Log" for every input purchase.
Designate a locked storage area for chemicals and seeds.
Implement an "Issue Log" to track what goes to which plot.

fixPlans7Day.title: Field Quality Checks (7 Days)
fixPlans7Day.description: Stop spacing and mixing mistakes in the field.
steps: Define "Standard of Work" for Spacing, Weeding, and Spraying.
Create a simple "Daily Spot Check" checklist.
Assign a supervisor to check work *during* execution, not after.
Require photo evidence of good/bad examples.

fixPlans7Day.title: Post-Harvest Loss Kill Switch (7 Days)
fixPlans7Day.description: Cut losses fast. Protect your harvest value.
steps: Set strict moisture/maturity standards for harvesting.
Define sorting rules (Grade A, B, Rejects).
Establish a "Post-Harvest Handling SOP" (shade, crates, tarps).
Inspect storage areas for pests/leaks and fix immediately.

fixPlans7Day.title: Transport & Payment Protection (7 Days)
fixPlans7Day.description: Stop weight and payment games.
steps: Draft a simple agreement for Transport (Cost, Timing, Liability).
Verify and record weights *at the farm* before loading.
Require a signed "Proof of Delivery" for every shipment.
Create a "Buyer Ledger" to track what is owed vs paid.

fixPlans7Day.title: Risk Playbook (7 Days)
fixPlans7Day.description: Reduce shock damage with preparation.
steps: Start a "Weekly Scouting" routine for pests/disease.
Define "Action Thresholds" (e.g., if >10% plants affected, spray).
Prepare a "Response Kit" (chemicals/tools) for common threats.
Check drainage/irrigation readiness for weather shocks.

fixPlans7Day.title: Draft 1-Page SLA Template (Cold Chain + Silo variants)
Launch Inbound Receiving Checklist + Photo Rule
Enforce Lot/Batch ID + Location ID from Day One
Set Up Quarantine / Hold Zone SOP
Map Temperature Sensors + Set Alarm Thresholds + Escalation Contacts
Implement Door Discipline Play (Strip Curtains, Door-Time Targets)
Create Excursion Response Script (Isolate → Verify → Document → Notify)
Launch Weekly Moisture & Temperature Check Plan (Silos)
Set Up Dock Scheduling Board (Time Slots, Priorities)
Implement Dispatch Accuracy Gate (Scan/Verify Before Loading)
Create Calibration Register (Device, Frequency, Last Date, Certificate)
Stop the Bleeding
tasks: Create 1-page Rate Card (labor, travel, min charge).
Start asking "What is at risk?" for triage.

fixPlans7Day.title: Visibility & Costing
tasks: Job cost the last 10 jobs (real hours vs quoted).

fixPlans7Day.title: Dispatch Control
tasks: Cluster routes to cut travel time.

fixPlans7Day.title: Parts Lockdown
tasks: List Top 20 critical spares to stock.

fixPlans7Day.title: Callback Kill Switch
tasks: Review any callback for root cause.

fixPlans7Day.title: Sell Stability
tasks: Call 5 customers to pitch pre-season check.

fixPlans7Day.title: SKU-Size Truth + Top-20 Fast Mover Counts
No Tag No Floor + Tagging Station Discipline
Fitting Room Count-In-Out + Damage Prevention Rule
Category Margin Map + Price Rule Baseline
Daily Cash + Momo Reconciliation + Variance Log
VIP List + Weekly WhatsApp Follow-Up Rhythm
Outfit Bundle Board + Styling Script Launch
Delegation Limits for Discount and Refund Decisions
Private Label or Exclusive Sourcing Candidate List
Experience Upgrade Pilot (Styling Session + Size Guide)
Incentives Aligned to Margin + Low Returns
Kid Survival Lock (7 Days)
fixPlans7Day.text: Create kidding watchlist. Clean kidding pen. Start early kid checks (warmth + hygiene).

fixPlans7Day.title: Parasite Breaker (7 Days)
fixPlans7Day.text: Set monitoring routine. Check for anemia/diarrhea. Isolate sick goats immediately.

fixPlans7Day.title: Feed Gap Shield (7 Days)
fixPlans7Day.text: Forecast dry season. Plan reserves now. Locate hay/silage source. Reduce feed waste.

fixPlans7Day.title: Herd Structure & Cull (7 Days)
fixPlans7Day.text: Categorize herd. Identify 'sell' candidates (old, sick, barren). Protect best does.

fixPlans7Day.title: Theft & Escape Control (7 Days)
fixPlans7Day.text: Tag/mark all goats. Do a physical count. Fix weak fence points. Start movement log.

fixPlans7Day.title: Market Grade Ladder (7 Days)
fixPlans7Day.text: Define 3 grades (Premium, Standard, Cull). Check local prices. Sort sale goats by grade.

fixPlans7Day.title: Profit Stabilize (7 Days)
fixPlans7Day.text: Reinvest in bottleleck (feed/health). Separate farm cash. Prepare budget.

fixPlans7Day.title: Routine Uptime (7 Days)
fixPlans7Day.text: Protect critical tasks. Fix damp housing immediately. Assign roles.

fixPlans7Day.title: Traceability Map Drill
fixPlans7Day.description: Run a traceability drill: prove you can isolate affected batches within 30 minutes.

fixPlans7Day.title: Label Control Lock
fixPlans7Day.description: Lock label control: one approved artwork folder, one approval log.

fixPlans7Day.title: Golden Batch Targets
fixPlans7Day.description: Define "Golden Batch" targets for top 10 SKUs (pH/viscosity/active/fill).

fixPlans7Day.title: Mixing Standard
fixPlans7Day.description: Standardize order of addition + mixing time/temp and post it at the tank.

fixPlans7Day.title: Promo ROI Check
fixPlans7Day.description: Stop "blind promos": require a 1-page promo ROI check before discounting.

fixPlans7Day.title: Returns Reason Triage
fixPlans7Day.description: Start returns tracking by cause (leak, performance, irritation, fragrance dislike).

fixPlans7Day.title: Low Margin Freeze
fixPlans7Day.description: Identify bottom 20% SKUs by margin and freeze discounts on them.

fixPlans7Day.title: Standard Cost Refresh
fixPlans7Day.description: Update standard costs for top inputs (surfactants, fragrance, bottles, caps).

fixPlans7Day.title: OEE Pilot
fixPlans7Day.description: Start daily OEE tracking on the top line (one dashboard, reason codes).

fixPlans7Day.title: Changeover Kits
fixPlans7Day.description: Standardize changeovers (pre-stage all materials + checklist) and measure time.

fixPlans7Day.title: Top 30 Cycle Count
fixPlans7Day.description: Cycle-count top 30 items and fix record accuracy immediately.

fixPlans7Day.title: Packaging Safety Stock
fixPlans7Day.description: Create a "ship blockers list" (critical packaging parts) and set min/max.

fixPlans7Day.title: Daily SQDC Huddle
fixPlans7Day.description: Launch daily SQDC huddles that close 1–2 actions/day (no backlog).

fixPlans7Day.title: Chemical Safety Sweep
fixPlans7Day.description: Run a chemical safety sweep: SDS present, labels correct, storage segregated.

fixPlans7Day.title: 7-Day "Showroom Quality" Reset
fixPlans7Day.description: Fast wins to stop the bleeding from rework and dust debt.

steps.action: Create Golden Samples: Mount one perfect finish sample. No match? No ship.
Implement Daily Dust-Down: Last 15 mins is strictly cleaning.
Offcut Bin Rules: Trash the firewood. Rack the good stuff. Clear the floor.
Hardware Kitting: Stop cutting until the hardware bin is full and labeled.
True Hourly Rate: Calculate the real cost of your shop time.
Morning Safety Huddle: Start the day with 2 mins on plan & hazards.
Standardize Drawer Boxes: Pick one method. Stop reinventing.

fixPlans7Day.title: Category Margin Map + Baseline Price Rules
Garage Credit Policy + Debtor Aging List
Garage Account List + Repeat Follow-Up Cadence
Trust + Authenticity Proof Stack (Invoice, Warranty, Source)
Response SLA + Quote Templates for Urgent Buyers
KPI Wall: Wrong Fit, Returns, Debtors, Shrink, Stockouts
Delegation Limits for Discounts, Returns, and Credits
Standards Coaching for Fitment, Labeling, and Pricing
Job Kit Launch (Service, Brake, Clutch) + Bundle Pricing
High-Value Item Controls (Lock, Log, Access Rules)
Incentives Aligned to Margin + Low Wrong-Fit + Low Returns
7-Day "Stabilize Profit" Actions
fixPlans7Day.description: Fast wins to stop leaks in forestry and timber operations.

steps.action: Create One-Page Strategy Map: define top 3 products, top 2 markets, and 3 'no-go' deals.
Stop unmanaged cutting: enforce a 'harvest authorization' sheet tied to block/plot & order.
Customer concentration alarm: list top buyers; set rule: no single buyer > X% next 90 days.
Traceability triage: pick one high-risk step (harvest docs, yard receiving) and standardize it.
Fix sorting immediately: introduce 3 yard zones (High-value, Standard, Utility/Waste).
Start measuring recovery daily (even crude): log input vs lumber output.
Run Weekly Profit Review: cash, receivables aging, inventory value, margin, claims.

fixPlans7Day.title: Stop Margin Bleeding
tasks: Pull last 30–90 days sales: top 20 SKUs by revenue.
Compute landed cost and gross margin per SKU.
Freeze “habit discounts” and require approval code.

fixPlans7Day.title: Kill Stockouts + Dead Stock
tasks: Identify top 20 stockouts and top 20 slow movers.
Apply FEFO; relocate near-expiry to “move-first” zone.
Launch 2 bundles (fast mover + slow mover) for 7 days.

fixPlans7Day.title: Tighten Receiving & Shrink
tasks: Start batch intake gate (photos + counts + lot capture).
Lock high-value items; start mini cycle count on A-items.

fixPlans7Day.title: Fix Credit Drift
tasks: List all receivables by days outstanding; call top 10 overdue.
Implement deposit rule for new/late buyers.
Pause credit for chronic late payers.

fixPlans7Day.title: Partner Discipline
tasks: Audit top dealers: storage, pricing compliance, display.
Retrain 3 key partners (storage + FEFO + returns rules).

fixPlans7Day.title: Reduce Returns
tasks: Categorize returns: quality, misuse, wrong product, damage.
Add a 60-second “fit check” script at point of sale.

fixPlans7Day.title: Lock the Controls
tasks: Create a 1-page weekly scorecard (stockouts, shrink, margin, DSO).
Assign an owner and a weekly review time.

fixPlans7Day.title: Money Truth Day
tasks: Separate farm cash from home cash.

fixPlans7Day.title: IPM Control Day
tasks: Set action thresholds (not just calendar spraying).

fixPlans7Day.title: Procurement Lock Day
tasks: List critical inputs for next 30 days.

fixPlans7Day.title: T7-01 Shrink Map (Weight checkpoints)
fixPlans7Day.text: Install weight checkpoints at: 1) Pickup, 2) Depot Arrival, 3) Dispatch. Weekly variance report exposes where the leak is.

fixPlans7Day.title: T7-02 Grade Standard Card + Training
fixPlans7Day.text: Create a 1-page visual grade card (A/B/Reject) for field staff. Train them to grade at source, not just at the depot.

fixPlans7Day.title: T7-03 Dispatch Slot Board
fixPlans7Day.text: Install a simple whiteboard/schedule for dispatch slots. Buyers/Drivers must book a slot. No slot = wait.

fixPlans7Day.title: T7-04 Truck Fill Rule + Trip Sheet
fixPlans7Day.text: Enforce minimum fill % (e.g., 90%) before departure unless authorized. Use a Trip Sheet to track cost per kg.

fixPlans7Day.title: T7-05 Hidden Fees Ledger
fixPlans7Day.text: List every fee (market entry, loading, bribes, commissions) in one sheet. Calc the true sum per trip.

fixPlans7Day.title: T7-06 Buyer Terms Reset (deposit/PO rules)
fixPlans7Day.text: Draft standard terms: 50% deposit for new buyers, strict net-7 for existing. Stop verbal credit.

fixPlans7Day.title: T7-07 Intake Checklist (defects/moisture/packing)
fixPlans7Day.text: Reject bad produce at the gate. Check moisture, heat, and defects before you pay or store.

fixPlans7Day.title: T7-08 Evidence Bundle (photos+weights+grade notes)
fixPlans7Day.text: For every shipment: 3 photos (pack, truck, seal) + weight slip. Send to buyer before dispatch.

fixPlans7Day.title: T7-09 Complaint Closure Log
fixPlans7Day.text: Log every complaint. Rule: Acknowledge in 1 hour, resolve in 24 hours. Turn complaints into trust.

fixPlans7Day.title: T7-10 Pre-sell Pilot
fixPlans7Day.text: Try to sell 30% of next week's volume before you buy it. Lock prices early.

fixPlans7Day.title: T7-11 Cash Control Routine (daily close)
fixPlans7Day.text: End of day rule: Cash in hand MUST match receipts. Discrepancies logged immediately.

fixPlans7Day.title: T7-12 Handling Standard (no bruising rule)
fixPlans7Day.text: Train staff: 'Don't throw crates.' 'Don't overstack.' Simple visual rules to stop bruising.

fixPlans7Day.title: T7-EXP-01 Forward Booking Plan
fixPlans7Day.text: Create a 4-week rolling forecast for containers. Book slots >14 days out to secure rates.

fixPlans7Day.title: T7-EXP-02 Pre-Clearance Checklist
fixPlans7Day.text: Docs must be 100% ready BEFORE the container gate-in. Use a 'No Docs, No Load' rule.

fixPlans7Day.title: T7-EXP-03 FX Buffer Policy
fixPlans7Day.text: Price all deals with a 3-5% FX buffer or lock rate at invoice. Don't gamble on currency.

fixPlans7Day.title: T7-EXP-04 Temp Recorder Protocol
fixPlans7Day.text: Place temp recorders (e.g., Tympani) in every container. Photo evidence of placement required.

tasks: Set lot coding + traceability for all honey leaving.
Train helpers: inspection checklist, hygiene, labeling.
Build unit economics: profit per hive, cost per jar.
Monthly cash forecast and reinvestment rules.

fixPlans30Day.title: Fingerling/Seed Quality Gate
fixPlans30Day.description: Stop "bad fish" at the gate.
fixPlans30Day.objective: Prevent stocking weak or diseased stock that kills profit for 6 months.
steps: Supplier scoring + quarantine/observation protocol
Random sampling: size uniformity, deformities, vigor, mortality in first 48–72 hrs
Stocking log: date, batch, source, counts, expected survival
"Reject rules" for weak batches + replacement terms
fixPlans30Day.outcome: Only viable stock enters the system.

fixPlans30Day.title: FCR Control System
fixPlans30Day.description: Stop feeding profit to the water.
fixPlans30Day.objective: Lower feed cost per kg by matching ration to biomass and appetite.
steps: Feeding schedule by biomass estimate + water temp
Weekly sample weighing + biomass calculation
Feed log: kg issued, kg fed, feeding times, leftover check
Trigger rules: if FCR worsens → adjust ration, check water, check health
fixPlans30Day.outcome: Lower FCR, reduced waste, better water quality.

fixPlans30Day.title: Water Quality Lock
fixPlans30Day.description: Prevent silent losses from bad water.
fixPlans30Day.objective: Maintain optimal growth conditions and prevent stress-induced disease.
steps: Minimum test cadence (daily DO/temp; 2–3x/week pH; weekly ammonia/nitrite; more for RAS)
Aeration plan + backup power
"Red zone" thresholds + immediate response checklist
Pond/tank cleaning routines; sludge management; exchange/recirculation plan
fixPlans30Day.outcome: Consistent growth, lower mortality risk.

fixPlans30Day.title: Biosecurity Shield
fixPlans30Day.description: Keep disease out.
fixPlans30Day.objective: Prevent pathogen entry and spread between units.
steps: Visitor control + footbaths + tool separation
Stock movement rules (no mixing unknown batches)
Dead fish removal protocol + disposal log
Health observation checklist + escalation to vet/tech
fixPlans30Day.outcome: Reduced disease outbreaks and treatment costs.

fixPlans30Day.title: Harvest Timing & Grading Engine
fixPlans30Day.description: Maximize the value of every fish.
fixPlans30Day.objective: Sell at the right size and uniformity for premium prices.
steps: Size-based harvest plan (avoid "too early/too late")
On-farm grading to protect premium price
Harvest loss controls: nets, crowding time limits, bruising reduction
Yield forecast by week for buyer commitments
fixPlans30Day.outcome: Higher average price per kg and better buyer satisfaction.

fixPlans30Day.title: Post-Harvest Cold Chain Discipline
fixPlans30Day.description: Lock in freshness and weight.
fixPlans30Day.objective: Prevent spoilage and rejections by maintaining temperature.
steps: Time-to-ice rule + ice ratio standard (e.g., 1:1 in hot climates)
Clean crates, clean water, clean surfaces (HACCP-style basics)
Temperature log at dispatch + receiving
Reject analysis: why buyers downgrade/reject
fixPlans30Day.outcome: Reduced spoilage, fewer claims, better reputation.

fixPlans30Day.title: Capture Fishery Landing-Site Handling
fixPlans30Day.description: For capture fisheries: preserve catch value.
fixPlans30Day.objective: Ensure catch from boats retains value through proper landing procedures.
steps: Simple landing SOP: shade, quick sort, wash policy, immediate icing
Lot tagging by boat/crew/time
Weight verification process (reduce disputes)
Quality-based payment incentives
fixPlans30Day.outcome: Higher value catch, less waste.

fixPlans30Day.title: Channel Power Upgrade
fixPlans30Day.description: Stop being a price taker.
fixPlans30Day.objective: Diversify buyers and sell on value/grade.
steps: Grade-based pricing table (visible to team)
Diversify channels: processors, retailers, restaurants, intermediaries
Simple contracts: volumes, grades, payment terms, claims rules
Proof pack: temp logs, handling SOPs, traceability
fixPlans30Day.outcome: Better margins, reduced buyer risk.

fixPlans30Day.title: Cost-Per-Kg Master Model
fixPlans30Day.description: Know your true score.
fixPlans30Day.objective: Calculate fully loaded cost per kg to drive pricing and efficiency.
steps: Fully loaded cost: feed + seed + labor + energy + health + depreciation + transport + ice
Weekly "expected margin vs actual margin"
Identify top 3 drivers and set weekly targets
fixPlans30Day.outcome: Data-driven decisions on pricing and cost control.

fixPlans30Day.title: Cash Discipline Wall
fixPlans30Day.description: Protect the cash.
fixPlans30Day.objective: Prevent leakage and ensure liquidity.
steps: Role separation: purchase, store, approve, pay
Feed/ice/fuel reconciliations weekly
Buyer receivables tracker + follow-up cadence
Farmer/supplier payment calendar to protect supply
fixPlans30Day.outcome: Reduced fraud, improved cashflow.

fixPlans30Day.title: Uptime & Maintenance Discipline
fixPlans30Day.description: Keep the system running.
fixPlans30Day.objective: Prevent disastrous failure of aeration, power, or cold chain.
steps: Preventive maintenance schedule (aerators, pumps, generators, chillers, nets)
Critical spares kit + downtime log
Power backup drills + response time KPI
Compliance calendar (permits, lab tests, audits)
fixPlans30Day.outcome: High uptime, reduced emergency costs, safety compliance.

fixPlans30Day.title: ABC Cycle Counts + Reorder Triggers (Top-50 SKUs)
Route Cost Visibility + Delivery SOP by Product Type
Supplier Receiving Accuracy Scorecard + Correction Cadence
Routine Compliance Tracker + Shift Handover Discipline
Weekly Margin Leak Review + Price Update Cadence
Discount Drift Audit + Scripted Value-Based Selling
Cash Audit Spot Checks + Refund SOP
Credit Cutoff Enforcement + Collections Escalation Ladder
Delivery Cost Recovery Through Pricing/Minimum-Order Rules
Contractor Tier Program + Quote Conversion Cadence
Segmented Follow-up Calendar + Repeat Trigger Rules
Standard Project Quote Templates + Bundle Optimization
Weekly Root-Cause Closure on Top 3 Leaks
Workflow Standardization with Training and Adoption Tracking
Supplier Verification Scorecards + Defect Response SOP
Safety Audit Rhythm + Corrective Action Tracker
Weekly Fast-Mover Cycle Count + Supplier Reorder Calendar
Proof-Before-Print for Large Jobs + Job-Type Price Table
Weekly Margin Leak Review by Category
Shrink Controls + Weekly Cash Spot Audits
Service Margin Tracking by Job Type
Receiving Evidence Trail + Supplier Claim Workflow
True Unit Cost Engine (by SKU + delivery)
Quality Proof Pack (tamper seal + test cadence + batch code)
30-Day "Build Control" Plan
fixPlans30Day.description: System wins to lock in long-term profit.

steps.action: Create 5 SOPs (feeding, watering, sick pen, quarantine, loading). Implement Minimum Viable Records (MVR).
Separate animals into 3–4 groups by need. Start weekly weight/gain proxy tracking. Add pasture rotation schedule.
Formalize biosecurity plan (entry rules, visitor log, quarantine). Staff training: low-stress handling + illness detection.
Compute cost/day and margin per batch. Run monthly review. Lock supplier improvements.

fixPlans30Day.diagnosis: Production is random (births anytime) and sales are reactive, preventing scale and profit growth.

evidenceSnapshots.whyItMatters: High mortality due to lack of feed.

quickWins.title: Separation Pens
quickWins.desc: Ensure sick and newborn pens exist and are used.

fixPlans30Day.winCondition: Production is planned (breeding, feeding) and sales are driven by readiness, not panic.

system30.title: Breeding Calendar
system30.desc: Define breeding windows aligned with feed seasons.

system30.title: Priority Feeding
system30.desc: Target feed to weaners and lactating females.

fixPlans30Day.title: Week 1 Standardize: SOP baseline and role scorecards
fixPlans30Day.description: Standardize core workflows: intake/testing, bundles, discounts, returns, repairs, and cash-up routines.
steps: General Manager signs off SOP library with owner per workflow.
Department Leads publish role scorecards and minimum standards.
Weekly audit verifies compliance and closes corrective actions.
fixPlans30Day.objective: Move execution from memory-driven to system-driven.
fixPlans30Day.outcome: Core processes are documented, owned, and audited.

fixPlans30Day.title: Week 2 Inventory and Shrink System: ABC counts and access discipline
fixPlans30Day.description: Implement ABC cycle counts, high-value custody controls, and reorder points for top sellers.
steps: Inventory Controller runs A weekly, B monthly, C quarterly cycle-count schedule.
Supervisor enforces high-value access log with dual sign-off where needed.
Procurement sets reorder points and min-max levels for fast movers.
fixPlans30Day.objective: Increase availability and reduce inventory leakage.
fixPlans30Day.outcome: Inventory system supports both control and throughput.

fixPlans30Day.title: Week 3 Finance and Visibility: true margin calculator plus rolling cash forecast
fixPlans30Day.description: Operationalize true margin calculations, 4-week cash forecast, and supplier-aging review cadence.
steps: Finance Manager builds true-margin model with labor, parts, fees, and warranty impacts.
Accountant maintains 4-week rolling cashflow view and weekly variance review.
Leadership reviews supplier aging and payment priority against stock risk.
fixPlans30Day.objective: Protect cashflow and pricing quality under real cost structure.
fixPlans30Day.outcome: Management decisions are grounded in verified margin and cash position.

fixPlans30Day.title: Week 4 Growth Engine: referral program, inventory-linked promo calendar, trust messaging
fixPlans30Day.description: Scale controlled growth with referral mechanics, promo planning tied to inventory goals, and repairability trust cues.
steps: Marketing Lead launches referral give-get structure with redemption tracking.
Merchandising Lead aligns monthly promotions to dead-stock and margin targets.
Sales and Service teams embed trust messaging: warranty clarity, QA proof, and repair options.
fixPlans30Day.objective: Build repeatable growth without panic discounting.
fixPlans30Day.outcome: Demand engine is measurable and aligned with profit control.

fixPlans30Day.title: P2 Demand Snippet: source-to-margin campaign tracker
fixPlans30Day.description: Track source, lead, sale, and margin per campaign to replace visibility metrics with profitability metrics.
steps: Performance Marketer tags every campaign and channel source code.
Sales Ops logs conversion and gross profit by lead source.
Weekly review kills low-margin campaigns and scales proven offers.
fixPlans30Day.objective: Align marketing spend to profitable demand.
fixPlans30Day.outcome: Campaign decisions become evidence-led.

fixPlans30Day.title: P4 Operations Snippet: repair ticketing, approval proof, and QA gate library
fixPlans30Day.description: Install full repair control library from intake photos through QA handover evidence.
steps: Service Manager maps stages and max WIP per stage.
Technicians attach approval proof before part swap.
QA Technician validates final checklist before customer handover.
fixPlans30Day.objective: Create predictable repair throughput with lower rework.
fixPlans30Day.outcome: Repair operations become measurable and dispute-safe.

fixPlans30Day.title: P6 People Snippet: weekly two-hour training and balanced incentive plan
fixPlans30Day.description: Institutionalize weekly capability cadence and incentives tied to profit-safe behavior.
steps: HR or Store Manager runs weekly two-hour training agenda (products, scripts, fraud controls).
Role scorecards track attach, returns, and review quality per staff.
Incentives rebalance from volume-only to quality-margin outcomes.
fixPlans30Day.objective: Stabilize execution quality and reduce turnover-driven drift.
fixPlans30Day.outcome: Team behavior aligns with margin and trust goals.

fixPlans30Day.title: P7 Trust Snippet: warranty clarity pack, review response SLA, and customer-save SOP
fixPlans30Day.description: Systematize trust protection through clear policy language, response discipline, and escalation controls.
steps: Warranty and Returns Officer publishes plain-language warranty card with exclusions.
Customer Service responds to reviews within defined SLA window.
Store Manager runs customer-save escalation for high-risk complaints.
fixPlans30Day.objective: Reduce trust volatility and preserve referral engine.
fixPlans30Day.outcome: Trust control becomes routine, documented, and measurable.

fixPlans30Day.title: Pack A: Lamb Survival Lock
fixPlans30Day.description: Stop the #1 profit leak: lambs dying before wean.
fixPlans30Day.objective: Increase lambs weaned per ewe.
steps: Create a "Lambing Watchlist" for ewes due in 2 weeks.
Prepare a clean, dry lambing area (sanitized pen or designated clean paddock).
Implement AM/PM lamb check routine (warmth, colostrum intake, hygiene).
Ensure "naval dip" (iodine) for every newborn to prevent infection.
fixPlans30Day.outcome: Lambing register + higher survival rate.

fixPlans30Day.title: Pack B: Worm Pressure Breaker
fixPlans30Day.description: Worms steal months of growth. Break the cycle now.
fixPlans30Day.objective: Reduce parasite burden and improve growth rates.
steps: Start a "Monitoring Routine" (FAMACHA/eye color checks + diarrhea scan).
Dose strategically based on weight (not guess) and symptoms.
Rotate pasture or resting areas to reduce reinfection risk.
Improve hygiene in night housing (clean bedding breaks the cycle).
fixPlans30Day.outcome: Parasite log + lower drug costs + faster growth.

fixPlans30Day.title: Pack C: Footrot & Mobility Recovery
fixPlans30Day.description: Limping sheep don’t eat, don’t breed, and don’t grow.
fixPlans30Day.objective: Eliminate footrot as a herd-wide issue.
steps: Inspect every sheep: Separate clean vs. infected.
Pare/trim infected hooves and apply treatment (spray/bath).
Force dry bedding control in night shelter (moisture = rot).
Run the "clean" flock through a preventive footbath.
fixPlans30Day.outcome: Mobility restored + higher feed intake.

fixPlans30Day.title: Pack D: Dry Season Feed Gap Shield
fixPlans30Day.description: Prevent the "reset" where flock loses all its gained weight.
fixPlans30Day.objective: Maintain BCS and survival through dry season.
steps: Calculate the "Feed Gap" (how many weeks of drought vs. available stored feed).
Secure roughage reserves (hay/silage/residues) NOW.
Purchase targeted supplements for high-priority groups (pregnant ewes, weaners).
Implement strict rationing (don’t waste feed on the ground).
fixPlans30Day.outcome: Dry-season feed calendar + minimized weight loss.

fixPlans30Day.title: Pack E: Flock Structure Optimizer
fixPlans30Day.description: Stop feeding unproductive animals. Keep only earners.
fixPlans30Day.objective: A flock composed of productive ewes and growing stock.
steps: Categorize the flock (Productive Ewes, Replacement Ewe Lambs, Rams, Fatteners).
Create a "Cull List" (barren >2 cycles, chronic sick, old, poor mothers).
Sell the Cull List to fund feed for the best animals.
Select replacements only from the best-performing mothers.
fixPlans30Day.outcome: Flock map + cull list + higher margin per head.

fixPlans30Day.title: Pack F: Market Grade Ladder
fixPlans30Day.description: Stop selling "sheep". Start selling "Grades".
fixPlans30Day.objective: Capture premiums for better animals.
steps: Define your Grades (e.g., Grade A Ram, Grade B Ewe, Feeder Lamb).
Sort animals into a "Sell Queue" based on readiness.
Check prices for specific grades (don’t ask "how much for a sheep").
Time sales around demand peaks (festivals, school fees) if possible.
fixPlans30Day.outcome: Price tracker + sell queue + better negotiation power.

fixPlans30Day.title: Pack G: Security & Loss Shield
fixPlans30Day.description: Stop silent theft and predator losses.
fixPlans30Day.objective: 100% accountability for every animal.
steps: Tag or mark every sheep (unique ID or flock mark).
Implement a "Night Count" routine (in) and "Morning Count" routine (out).
Reinforce the night enclosure (fix holes, add locks, lighting).
Reconcile movement log weekly (Deaths - Sales + Births = Count).
fixPlans30Day.outcome: Reconciliation sheet + secure perimeter.

fixPlans30Day.title: Pack H: Wool Value Capture
fixPlans30Day.description: Turn wool from waste into a bonus income stream.
fixPlans30Day.objective: Clean, quality wool that buyers accept.
steps: Schedule shearing before wool gets ruined (timing is key).
Control shearing hygiene (clean floor, avoid contamination).
Sort wool by quality (separate belly/dirty wool from fleece).
Store properly (dry, pest-free) until sale.
fixPlans30Day.outcome: Wool quality checklist + sales record.

fixPlans30Day.title: 30-Day System: Build Control
fixPlans30Day.description: Install the habits that make profit inevitable.
fixPlans30Day.objective: A predictable, system-managed sheep business.
steps: Week 1: Measurement. Tag sheep. Start KPI tracking (Mortality, Cost/Ewe).
Week 2: Feed & Grazing. Start rotation plan. Secure dry season reserves.
Week 3: Bio-Security. Worm/Health calendar. Footrot routine. Quarantine rules.
Week 4: Breeding & Cycles. Ram control. Lamb growth targets. Monthly financial review.
fixPlans30Day.outcome: Functioning management system with data visibility.

fixPlans30Day.title: Price Intelligence Loop (30 Days)
fixPlans30Day.description: Embed price tracking into your sales strategy.
steps: Maintain the 2x/week price collection routine.
Visualize price trends on a wall chart or dashboard.
Use price data to negotiate confidence with buyers.
Review sales performance against market averages monthly.

fixPlans30Day.title: Crop Profit Calculator (30 Days)
fixPlans30Day.description: Refine your financial model with actuals.
steps: Update the calculator with actual spend as the season progresses.
Compare "Budget vs Actual" for key cost lines.
Adjust sales targets if costs rise significantly.
Produce a 1-page P&L for your top 2 crops.

fixPlans30Day.title: Season Task Calendar (30 Days)
fixPlans30Day.description: Execute the plan and track adherence.
steps: Post the calendar where the team can see it.
Hold a Weekly Start-of-Week meeting to review upcoming tasks.
Track "Planned vs Actual" completion dates.
Adjust the calendar for weather events immediately.

fixPlans30Day.title: Input Control (30 Days)
fixPlans30Day.description: Systematize inventory management.
steps: Conduct a weekly stock take of all inputs.
Reconcile "Issued" vs "Remaining" stock.
Establish re-order points to avoid emergency trips.
Review supplier performance on quality and delivery.

fixPlans30Day.title: Field Quality Checks (30 Days)
fixPlans30Day.description: Build a culture of "Right First Time".
steps: Track Rework Rate weekly.
Retrain workers who consistently miss standards.
Reward teams with the lowest rework/error rate.
Maintain an "Exception Log" for all field issues.

fixPlans30Day.title: Post-Harvest Loss Kill Switch (30 Days)
fixPlans30Day.description: Institutionalize quality control.
steps: Record all losses in a "Loss Log" (Spillage, Spoilage, Theft).
Monitor storage conditions (temp/moisture) weekly.
Train all handlers on the new SOPs.
Track "Grade Distribution" for every harvest batch.

fixPlans30Day.title: Transport & Payment Protection (30 Days)
fixPlans30Day.description: Secure your revenue stream.
steps: Review all open invoices weekly.
Implement a script for following up on late payments.
Evaluate transporter performance (Damage, Delays).
Resolve any "Short Payment" disputes immediately with data.

fixPlans30Day.title: Risk Playbook (30 Days)
fixPlans30Day.description: Build long-term farm resilience.
steps: Maintain the scouting log and review trends.
Update the playbook based on what you see in the field.
Build a small "Shock Buffer" (cash or savings) for emergencies.
Ensure compliance with any chemical handling/safety rules.

fixPlans30Day.title: Implement Energy Control Moves (Night Curtains, Defrost Tuning, Demand Tracking)

tasks: Build standard Quote & Work Order templates.
Train team on Rate Card application.

fixPlans30Day.title: SKU-Size Matrix + Reorder Triggers by Size/Color

Kid Survival Lock (30 Days)
fixPlans30Day.text: Maintain kidding register. Execute kid survival checklist. Track weaning weights.

fixPlans30Day.title: Parasite Breaker (30 Days)
fixPlans30Day.text: Strategic deworming. Improve housing hygiene to reduce reinfection. Log treatment outcomes.

fixPlans30Day.title: Feed Gap Shield (30 Days)
fixPlans30Day.text: Build 30-day reserve. Supplement pregnant/lactating does/kids first. Track BCS stability.

fixPlans30Day.title: Herd Structure & Cull (30 Days)
fixPlans30Day.text: Execute cull list. Select replacements from best mothers. Map herd structure against feed capacity.

fixPlans30Day.title: Theft & Escape Control (30 Days)
fixPlans30Day.text: Monthly reconciliation count. Enforce night security. Log all exits/entries.

fixPlans30Day.title: Market Grade Ladder (30 Days)
fixPlans30Day.text: Build sell queue. Schedule sales for premium seasons (festivals). Track price per head.

fixPlans30Day.title: Profit Control (30 Days)
fixPlans30Day.text: Monthly financial review. Track costs per doe. Prove margin before expansion.

fixPlans30Day.title: Routine Uptime (30 Days)
fixPlans30Day.text: Checklist for daily tasks. Maintain fences proactively. Regular feed/water checks.

fixPlans30Day.title: Incentive Alignment for Recovery and Loss Prevention
30-Day "Production Flow" System
fixPlans30Day.description: System wins to lock in efficiency and profit margins.

steps.action: Scope Sign-off & Redline Review: Nothing gets ordered or cut without a signed scope and a builder review.
Shadow Boarding & Kanban: Visualize tools and consumables. Kill the 'search and carry'.
Callback Log & Change Orders: Track every return trip cost. Price every change immediately.
Skill Matrix & Install Walkthrough: Map your team's gaps. Standardize the client handover.

fixPlans30Day.title: Top Model Fitment Sheet + Substitute Options Matrix
Weekly Top-50 Cycle Count + Supplier Lead-Time Calendar
Urgent Order Response SLA + Dispatch Proof Routine
Dead Stock KPI Cadence + Cash Release Tracker
Weekly KPI Closure Rhythm + Leak Escalation Rules
Weekly SOP Audit + Repeat-Leak Elimination Loop
Bundle Optimization by Model and Job Type
Test-to-Scale Rules for New Stock Lines
Warranty Claim Evidence and Decision Framework
30-Day "Build Control" Actions
fixPlans30Day.description: System wins to lock in long-term timber profitability.

steps.action: Build a 12-month harvest + sales plan (by species, diameter class, product).
Create a product profitability ladder (best-to-worst margin) and redesign production priorities.
Implement internal traceability audits monthly (batch reconciliation).
Create a risk plan: fire, theft, pests, weather—assign owners and response playbooks.

tasks: Write SOPs: receiving, storage, FEFO, returns, suspect goods.
Build reorder points per category (seeds vs chemicals etc).
Add seasonality calendar (planting windows, disease cycles).
Launch monthly partner training (storage, safe use).
Implement lot tracking on invoices + returns.
Build Dashboard: margin by SKU, stock turns, DSO, shrink.
Create harvest readiness checklist + handling SOP.

fixPlans30Day.title: Adulteration Shield
fixPlans30Day.text: Standard intake testing (density/lactometer, alcohol test, acidity/pH, temperature, organoleptic checks). Clear reject protocol + documentation (no 'negotiation at the gate'). Farmer education: clean milking, no water addition, container hygiene. 'Test visible' culture: testing done in front of suppliers where appropriate. Repeat-offender rules + escalation ladder.

fixPlans30Day.title: Temperature Lock
fixPlans30Day.text: Immediate pre-chill temperature check at arrival. Batch tagging + time stamp. 'Time-to-chill' KPI tracked daily. Generator readiness: fuel, startup drill, weekly test. Insulated transport rules + max holding time SOP.

fixPlans30Day.title: Spoilage & Shrink Zeroing
fixPlans30Day.text: Daily reconciliation: liters in vs liters out vs liters spoiled. Identify loss points: transfer, filtration, valves, measurement methods, leaks. Calibrate measuring devices weekly (or per manufacturer). Clean-in-place (CIP) schedule + verification checklist.

fixPlans30Day.title: Route Profit Engine
fixPlans30Day.text: Route redesign: fewer dead-kilometers, cluster stops, fixed pickup windows. Simple dispatch board: planned liters vs actual liters per stop. Driver accountability: fuel logs + GPS where available. 'Late pickup = quality loss' enforcement.

fixPlans30Day.title: Farmer Loyalty Engine
fixPlans30Day.text: Predictable payment calendar + transparent pricing. Two-way communication: quality feedback per farmer. Micro-incentives: quality bonus, loyalty bonus, container cleanliness rewards. Handling complaints fast (payment, rejections, grading disputes).

fixPlans30Day.title: Buyer Power Upgrade
fixPlans30Day.text: Quality proof pack: daily test reports + traceability. Diversify buyers (2–4 channels): processor, hotel/retail, institutional, export where legal. Contract basics: volumes, quality specs, penalties, payment terms. Positioning: 'consistent cold chain + verified quality' sells at premium.

fixPlans30Day.title: Cash Discipline Wall
fixPlans30Day.text: Separate cash roles: receiving, recording, approving, paying. Daily cash + mobile money reconciliation. Farmer statement system (simple weekly SMS/printouts). Float buffer rule (e.g., hold X days operating expense).

fixPlans30Day.title: Uptime & Maintenance Discipline
fixPlans30Day.text: Preventive maintenance calendar (chiller, generator, pumps). Spare parts kit: seals, valves, hoses, filters, fuses. Downtime log + root cause + recurrence prevention. Vendor SLAs (service response time).

fixPlans30Day.title: T30-01 Route Profit Dashboard
fixPlans30Day.text: Build a simple sheet tracking P&L per route/truck. Cut the losers, double down on winners.

fixPlans30Day.title: T30-02 Supplier Tiering + Quality Score
fixPlans30Day.text: Score your suppliers (A/B/C) on quality and reliability. Give A-list better terms/priority.

fixPlans30Day.title: T30-03 Buyer Diversification Sprint
fixPlans30Day.text: Target to find 3 new buyers to reduce reliance on your top client below 50%.

fixPlans30Day.title: T30-04 Value-Add Pilot (grading/packing/branding)
fixPlans30Day.text: Launch one value-add test: e.g., Pre-packed net bags, cleaned veg, or branded boxes.

fixPlans30Day.title: T30-05 Institutional Contract Pilot
fixPlans30Day.text: Pitch a standing weekly order to 1 school/hotel/factory. Lock in volume.

fixPlans30Day.title: T30-06 Traceability Spine (lot tags + records)
fixPlans30Day.text: Tag every batch with a Lot ID. Track it from farm to final invoice. Essential for export/contracts.

fixPlans30Day.title: T30-07 Written Terms Templates
fixPlans30Day.text: Digitize your contracts. Create a simple PDF template for Sales/Buying. Sign on glass or email.

fixPlans30Day.title: T30-08 Quality Tier Pricing (A/B/C)
fixPlans30Day.text: Stop flat pricing. Charge premium for Grade A, discount for Grade C. Capture the value of quality.

fixPlans30Day.title: T30-09 Cold Chain Partner Pilot
fixPlans30Day.text: Test a refrigerated truck or cold storage for 1 route. Measure if the reduced shrink pays for the cost.

fixPlans30Day.title: T30-10 Agent Standards + Audit
fixPlans30Day.text: Checklist for field agents. Spot check their grading. Align them to your standard.

fixPlans30Day.title: T30-11 Incentives Align (quality + shrink)
fixPlans30Day.text: Change bonus structure. Speed is good, but Speed + Low Shrink = Bonus. Penalize damage.

fixPlans30Day.title: T30-12 Daily/Weekly Control Cadence
fixPlans30Day.text: Mondays: Plan. Fridays: Review P&L. Daily: 15-min standup on Ops blockages.

fixPlans30Day.title: T30-EXP-01 Market Diversification Plan
fixPlans30Day.text: Map 3 alternative markets/buyers. Send samples to 2 new prospects this month.

fixPlans30Day.title: T30-EXP-02 Compliance Calendar
fixPlans30Day.text: Map all cert renewals (GlobalGAP, etc.) on a wall calendar. Assign an owner for each.

fixPlans30Day.title: T30-EXP-03 Export Contract Template
fixPlans30Day.text: Standardize your sales contract. Define: Incoterms, Payment Terms, and Rejection/Claim procedure.
